K10D0138_H0140:294b-13: khyed kyis shes par gyis shig /
K10D0138_H0140:294b-14: khyed rnams las gang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung mi 'dod pa de ni /
K10D0138_H0140:294b-16: de nas bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag thams cad kyis 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0138_H0140:294b-17: bdag cag cung zad shes pa de kun kyang khyed kyi mthun /
K10D0138_H0140:294b-18: khyed rgya chen po'i gnas su rab tu 'byung na /
K10D0138_H0140:294b-19: khyed gang las rab tu 'byung ba de las bdag cag kyang rab tu 'byung ngo //

K10D0138_H0140:294b-22: ldan 'das las rab tu 'byung bar chas par bdud
K10D0138_H0140:294b-23: sdig can gyis rig nas ci nas de gnyis dge
K10D0138_H0140:294b-24: sbyong goo ta ma'i gan du 'gro mi nus par
K10D0138_H0140:294b-25: bya ba'i phyir rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen
K10D0138_H0140:294b-26: po'i phyi logs su g-yang sa chen po zabs su
K10D0138_H0140:295a-0: dpag tshad @295a *// brgya pa zhig sprul to //
K10D0138_H0140:295a-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di 'dra ba'i
K10D0138_H0140:295a-2: rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du
K10D0138_H0140:295a-3: mdzad de / ci nas kun du rgyu nye rgyal dang /
K10D0138_H0140:295a-4: pang nas skyes gnyis g-yang sa chen po de mi mthong zhing lam drang por 'gro bar mdzad do //
K10D0138_H0140:295a-5: yang bdud sdig can gyis de gnyis kyi mdun du ri chen po brtan pa /
K10D0138_H0140:295a-8: gcig tu stug por gyur pa /
K10D0138_H0140:295a-10: 'phang du dpag tshad stong yod pa zhig mngon par sprul te /
K10D0138_H0140:295a-11: sengge khro zhing gdug la gtum pa /
K10D0138_H0140:295a-12: sgra chen po 'byin pa stong yang mngon par sprul na /
K10D0138_H0140:295a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis gzi brjid dang rdzu 'phrul gyi
K10D0138_H0140:295a-14: mthus skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis ri de'ang
K10D0138_H0140:295a-15: ma mthong / sengge'ang ma mthong; sengge'i skad kyang ma
K10D0138_H0140:295a-16: thos te lam drang por bcom ldan 'das ga la
K10D0138_H0140:295a-17: ba de logs su song ngo //
K10D0138_H0140:295a-19: 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te /
K10D0138_H0140:295a-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0138_H0140:295a-24: g-yog gi tshogs can 'di gnyis la ltos /
K10D0138_H0140:295a-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0138_H0140:295b-0: skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis @295b g-yog dang bcas
K10D0138_H0140:295b-1: pa nga'i thad du rab tu byung nas gcig ni
K10D0138_H0140:295b-2: / nga'i nyan thos thams cad kyi nang na shes rab can gyi mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K10D0138_H0140:295b-4: rdzu 'phrul can gyi mchog tu 'gyur ro; ;de nas
K10D0138_H0140:295b-5: dge slong zhig gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa
K10D0138_H0140:295b-6: 'di smras so // skyes bu mkhas pa g-yog ldan 'di gnyis ni //
K10D0138_H0140:295b-7: rdzu 'phrul ldan dang shes rab 'jigs med par //
K10D0138_H0140:295b-8: mi mchog phan pa mdzad pas lung bstan te //
K10D0138_H0140:295b-9: bdag gis de gnyis bsti stang bskyed nas bsu //
K10D0138_H0140:295b-10: de nas dge slong de stan las langs nas dge slong mang po dang //
K10D0138_H0140:295b-12: rab tu byung ba mang po dang lhan cig tu
K10D0138_H0140:295b-13: skyes bu dam pa de gnyis bsus nas bsnyen bkur
K10D0138_H0140:295b-14: byas so // de nas skyes bu dam pa de
K10D0138_H0140:295b-15: gnyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste
K10D0138_H0140:295b-16: phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
K10D0138_H0140:295b-17: phyag btsal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom
K10D0138_H0140:295b-18: ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste bcom ldan 'das
K10D0138_H0140:295b-22: bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po bdag cag gnyis la stsal du gsol /
K10D0138_H0140:295b-23: bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du tshangs par
K10D0138_H0140:295b-24: spyad pa spyod do; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
K10D0138_H0140:295b-29: bram ze rgyal gyi bu lags te /
K10D0138_H0140:296a-3: bdag de las skyes pas na /
K10D0138_H0140:296a-4: de'i slad du bdag gi ming ni /
K10D0138_H0140:296a-5: sh'a ri'i bu zhes btags so //
K10D0138_H0140:296a-6: bdag rab tu 'byung bar yang pha mas gnang lags so //
K10D0138_H0140:296a-7: pang nas skyes kyis gsol pa /
K10D0138_H0140:296a-12: bdag de las skyes pas na /
K10D0138_H0140:296a-13: de'i slad du bdag gi ming ni /
K10D0138_H0140:296a-14: moonggal gyi bu zhes btags so //
K10D0138_H0140:296a-15: bdag rab tu 'byung bar yang pha mas gnang lags so //
K10D0138_H0140:296a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K10D0138_H0140:296a-17: moonggal gyi bu nga'i thad du g-yog dang bcas te
K10D0138_H0140:296a-18: tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bka' stsal pa
K10D0138_H0140:296a-19: dang / de nyid kyis de gnyis rab tu byung ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:296a-20: bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos por gyur to //
K10D0138_H0140:296a-22: moonggal gyi bu g-yog dang bcas pa rab tu byung
K10D0138_H0140:296a-23: nas ring po ma lon par bdud sdig can dbang
K10D0138_H0140:296a-24: phyug chen po'i gzugs su bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
K10D0138_H0140:296a-25: sngar 'dug nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0138_H0140:296a-26: gang dag bstan bcos don spyod mkhas pa rig pa'i pha rol song //
K10D0138_H0140:296a-27: de kun nga yi rkang la phyag 'tshal de dag 'dren pa nga //
K10D0138_H0140:296a-28: goo ta ma slob ma 'khor bcas nga la deng myur skyabs tshol cig /
K10D0138_H0140:296a-29: mya ngan 'das 'gro rgyas pa gsal ba'i lam ni khyed la bshad //
K10D0138_H0140:296a-30: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0138_H0140:296b-0: khyod lam 'gro ba 'di dag ngan 'gror @296b 'dren cing sdug bsngal rgya mtsho rnyed par byed //
K10D0138_H0140:296b-1: nga yi lam ni rgyu dang mi rgyu 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rgya mtsho skem byed pa //
K10D0138_H0140:296b-2: 'chal ba 'dzem pa med cing mu cor smra ba
K10D0138_H0140:296b-3: wa skad de yang ci zhig zer; ;khyod ni bcom
K10D0138_H0140:296b-4: zin bdud kyi las kyis nga la da yang 'dir
K10D0138_H0140:296b-6: de nas bdud sdig can gyis dbang phyug chen po'i
K10D0138_H0140:296b-7: gzugs mi snang bar byas nas tshangs pa'i cha lugs
K10D0138_H0140:296b-8: su bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di
K10D0138_H0140:296b-10: khyod kyi shes rab kyis ni las dang nyon mongs sred pa'i myu gu rab tu bsal //
K10D0138_H0140:296b-11: de yi sman chad thub pa ji snyed sems can don 'dir 'di ltar sdug bsngal spro //
K10D0138_H0140:296b-12: gtso bo 'gro ba 'di na khyod kyi snod 'gyur skye bo gang na'ang ma mchis te //
K10D0138_H0140:296b-13: dus 'di lags na skyon dang bral khyod ci yi
K10D0138_H0140:296b-14: slad du mya ngan myur mi 'da'; ;bcom ldan 'das
K10D0138_H0140:296b-16: ngas 'dul gang 'khod sems can mtshungs med gangg'a'i bye ma snyed //
K10D0138_H0140:296b-17: ngas mthong de dag nga yi snying rjes thar par bya ba yin //
K10D0138_H0140:296b-18: 'gro ba rab 'bring ngan par gyur pa thar te mthar thug na //
K10D0138_H0140:296b-19: de nas mya ngan 'da' yi blo gros ngan pa g-yos ci bskul //
K10D0138_H0140:296b-20: de nas yang bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid
K10D0138_H0140:296b-21: mi bde nas yid la bcags te de nyid du
K10D0138_H0140:296b-22: mi snang bar gyur nas rang gi gnas su song
K10D0138_H0140:296b-23: ste mya ngan gyi khang par zhugs nas 'dug pa
K10D0138_H0140:297a-0: dang / de'i mod la bdud kyi gnas na 'khod pa'i sems can kun phan @297a *//
K10D0138_H0140:297a-1: tshun 'di skad du ci'i rgyus bdag cag gi rgyal
K10D0138_H0140:297a-2: po chen po 'di mya ngan gyi khang bar zhugs
K10D0138_H0140:297a-3: te 'dug pa su'ang mi shes so //
K10D0138_H0140:297a-5: de nas bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya tsam rab tu dga' bar byed pa'i me tog dang /
K10D0138_H0140:297a-9: byug pa thogs te rab tu yid du 'ong ba'i gos dang /
K10D0138_H0140:297a-10: lha ba lhub dag gis bdag cag brgyan nas rab
K10D0138_H0140:297a-11: tu yid du 'ong zhing mos par byed pa'i lha'i
K10D0138_H0140:297a-13: rab tu yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs gyis glu len /
K10D0138_H0140:297a-14: gar pa byed cing yan lag la dang ldan pa'i
K10D0138_H0140:297a-15: lha'i sil snyan dag byas nas dga' ba'i rtsed mo
K10D0138_H0140:297a-16: dang ldan par bdud sdig can gyi mdun du 'khod
K10D0138_H0140:297a-17: pa dang / bdud sdig can des lag pa gnyis bsgrengs nas pos te sgra ma byed /
K10D0138_H0140:297a-18: sgra ma byed ces smras pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:297a-19: yud tsam zhig lha'i bu mo dag cang mi zer bar 'khod do //
K10D0138_H0140:297a-20: yang glu rab tu blangs shing sil snyan byas pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:297a-21: bdud sdig can gyis lag pa gnyis g-yabs te bos so //
K10D0138_H0140:297a-22: lha'i bu mo de dag gis dga' ba dang ldan pa'i glu dang /
K10D0138_H0140:297a-24: sil snyan lan bdun gyi bar du byas pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:297a-25: yang de bzhin du bdud sdig can de lag pa bsgrengs nas 'bod cing sgra ma byed /
K10D0138_H0140:297a-26: sgra ma byed ces zer ro //
K10D0138_H0140:297a-27: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:297a-28: lha'i bu mo de dag cang mi zer bar 'khod do //
K10D0138_H0140:297a-29: de nas lha'i bu mo dbyangs snyan glog ces bya
K10D0138_H0140:297b-0: bas @297b bdud sdig can ga la ba de logs
K10D0138_H0140:297b-1: su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces
K10D0138_H0140:297b-2: smras so // gtso bo khyod kyis deng 'dir 'chi 'pho'i ltas shig gzigs sam ci //
K10D0138_H0140:297b-3: 'on tam ci zhig de ring 'gro ba zhugs kyis 'khrugs gyur tam //
K10D0138_H0140:297b-4: 'on te 'di ni khyod dgra stobs chen 'ga' zhig mchis lags sam //
K10D0138_H0140:297b-5: ci yi slad du khyed ni dgyes par mi bzhugs thugs ngan mdzad //
K10D0138_H0140:297b-7: nga la dgra yod pa ni stobs ldan sems thul pa //
K10D0138_H0140:297b-8: sa steng sh'akya'i bu pho sgyu ma bslabs pa'i blo //
K10D0138_H0140:297b-9: de ni ci nas gal te brlags par ma gyur na //
K10D0138_H0140:297b-10: de yis nga yi 'dod khams 'di ni stong par byed //
K10D0138_H0140:297b-12: gtso bo srid gsum bcings sred rgya mtsho mtha' ring la //
K10D0138_H0140:297b-13: zad bgyid nus pa'i stobs dang ldan pa su zhig mchis //
K10D0138_H0140:297b-14: bdag po thabs stobs brtson 'grus rtsal rnams gang gis kyang //
K10D0138_H0140:297b-15: de la de ring ma lus bgyid par nus ma mchis //
K10D0138_H0140:297b-17: sbyin dang brtul zhugs bsam pa smon lam snying rje'i
K10D0138_H0140:297b-18: zhags pa can; ;stong pa mtshan ma med pa'i mtshon
K10D0138_H0140:297b-19: cha mchog dang gzhu thogs te //
K10D0138_H0140:297b-20: 'khor ba las byung rab tu zhi ba'i lam dang mthun gyur nas //
K10D0138_H0140:297b-21: srid pa ma lus zlog pa nye bar bstan par
K10D0138_H0140:297b-22: byed pa po; ;de yi slob ma bsam gtan la
K10D0138_H0140:297b-23: ni mngon par brtson yid kyis //
K10D0138_H0140:297b-24: dpen par rgyu zhing nyes pa zad par bya phyir khor zug tu //
K10D0138_H0140:298a-0: cho ga bzhin du zhugs nas grong dang grong khyer stong @298a *//
K10D0138_H0140:298a-2: nags kyi nang dag dang ni ri yi sman ljongs rnams na gnas //
K10D0138_H0140:298a-3: rdzu 'phrul dang ni stobs dang nying rje'i grogs dang ldan pa yi //
K10D0138_H0140:298a-4: dam pa nye rgyal bang nas skyes gnyis thub pas btul par 'gyur //
K10D0138_H0140:298a-5: rab du la chos can 'jig rten gsum kun cho ga bzhin du btul //
K10D0138_H0140:298a-6: des ni nga yi 'dod khams 'di dag stong bar byed par 'gyur //
K10D0138_H0140:298a-7: de nas bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya po de
K10D0138_H0140:298a-8: dag gis bdud sdig can las bcom ldan 'das kyi
K10D0138_H0140:298a-9: yon tan gyi bsngags pa thos nas thams cad kyis
K10D0138_H0140:298a-10: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam pa dang
K10D0138_H0140:298a-11: bral ba'i glog ces bya ba thob bo //
K10D0138_H0140:298a-12: de nas bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya po de
K10D0138_H0140:298a-13: dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i
K10D0138_H0140:298a-22: rgyan de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su gtor ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:298a-24: sil snyan nas rgyan gyi bar du de dag bcom
K10D0138_H0140:298a-25: ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus 'od ma'i tshal
K10D0138_H0140:298a-27: bdud kyi bu mo de dag kyang g-yog dang bcas pas so so nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //
K10D0138_H0140:298a-28: de dag gis mthong nas kyang rab tu dga' ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:298a-29: rangs pa skyes par gyur to //
K10D0138_H0140:298a-30: gang gi phyir 'od ma'i tshal du 'di lta bu'i
K10D0138_H0140:298b-0: me tog gi char rab tu ba bces @298b dge
K10D0138_H0140:298b-1: slong de dag theg tshom skyes nas bcom ldan 'das
K10D0138_H0140:298b-4: moonggal gyi bu g-yog dang bcas pa 'di gnyis la ngo mtshar dang /
K10D0138_H0140:298b-5: rmad du byung ba chen po sngon ma mthong ma
K10D0138_H0140:298b-6: thos pa'i me tog gi char chen po rab tu
K10D0138_H0140:298b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0138_H0140:298b-12: rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyi mthu ma yin te /
K10D0138_H0140:298b-13: bdud sdig can gyi g-yog mo lnga brgya tsam gyis
K10D0138_H0140:298b-14: bdud kyi khang pa de nas nga la mchod pa
K10D0138_H0140:298b-15: bya ba'i phyir 'di lta bu'i me tog gi char
K10D0138_H0140:298b-16: chen po nas rgyan gyi bar gyi char phab bo
K10D0138_H0140:298b-17: // de dag ring por mi thogs par 'dir 'ongs te /
K10D0138_H0140:298b-18: nga las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'thob bo //
K10D0138_H0140:298b-19: de nas bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya tsam po
K10D0138_H0140:298b-20: de dag so so nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung
K10D0138_H0140:298b-21: dang / brjod pa'i dbyangs thos nas bcom ldan 'das
K10D0138_H0140:298b-22: la de bas kyang rab tu dga' ba skyes te
K10D0138_H0140:298b-23: dang / / de dag dga' ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:298b-24: rangs pa des byang chub kyi sems brjed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo //
K10D0138_H0140:298b-25: de nas yang bdud kyi bu mo de dag bdud
K10D0138_H0140:298b-26: kyi khang pa der gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos
K10D0138_H0140:298b-27: te bus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs
K10D0138_H0140:298b-28: nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das phyogs gang
K10D0138_H0140:298b-29: na bzhugs pa'i phyogs der bltas nas 'di skad ces
K10D0138_H0140:299a-1: ma lus skyem pa 'gro ba'i mig gcig pu //
K10D0138_H0140:299a-2: mig ma mchis pa'i 'jig rten kun la gzigs nas ni //
K10D0138_H0140:299a-3: khyod deng lha dang mir bcas pa yi 'gro ba sgrol //
K10D0138_H0140:299a-4: thub pa bdag cag ji ltar myur du sangs rgyas 'gyur //
K10D0138_H0140:299a-5: lha dang mis mchod don dam gsung ba bcom ldan 'das //
K10D0138_H0140:299a-6: bdag cag mthun par bud med smad pa nyid spangs nas //
K10D0138_H0140:299a-7: blo mchog khyod kyi 'phrul gyi drung du myur bar ni //
K10D0138_H0140:299a-8: mchis nas 'di bzhin thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung mnyan to //
K10D0138_H0140:299a-9: bdag med gsung ba don dam gzigs pa bcom ldan 'das //
K10D0138_H0140:299a-10: byang chub yan lag rin chen dri med nor gsung sgron //
K10D0138_H0140:299a-11: mtshungs med bdud kyi stobs btul khyod kyis bdag cag la //
K10D0138_H0140:299a-12: da ltar myur du lhan cig byang chub lung bstan gsol //
K10D0138_H0140:299a-13: de nas bdud kyi bu mo de dag stan las
K10D0138_H0140:299a-14: langs nas mgrin gcig tu bdud sdig can la 'di
K10D0138_H0140:299a-16: nyes byas blo gros can khyod snying po med g-yo ba'i //
K10D0138_H0140:299a-17: dpal rnyed ci phyir bcom ldan 'das la sdang bar sems //
K10D0138_H0140:299a-18: dregs pas gos nas skye ba la sogs sdug bsngal gyis //
K10D0138_H0140:299a-19: lus kun gtses te mi bzad gnas su nye bar song //
K10D0138_H0140:299a-20: de ltar khro ba sdangs te rgyal la dad par gyis //
K10D0138_H0140:299a-21: 'khor ba'i nyes pa dregs pa'i 'dam las thar pa'i bdag /
K10D0138_H0140:299a-22: 'di ni nyid kyis 'gro ba kun gyi ngo bo mkhyen //
K10D0138_H0140:299a-23: thugs rje can gyi skyabs su 'dong gi myur du bzhud //
K10D0138_H0140:299b-0: @299b de nas bdud sdig can shin tu gdug pa'i yid dang ldan pa 'di snyam du sems te /
K10D0138_H0140:299b-1: bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i bdud kyi stobs kyi yul drag po dran par byas la /
K10D0138_H0140:299b-2: gang g-yog mo lnga brgya tsam 'di dag bdag nyid
K10D0138_H0140:299b-3: bcing ba lngas bcings par mthong bar byas te 'di
K10D0138_H0140:299b-4: nas bzlog la 'gro mi nus par bya'o //
K10D0138_H0140:299b-6: bdud des de dag bcing bar ma nus so; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
K10D0138_H0140:299b-7: 'di ltar g-yog mo lnga brgya tsam po de dag
K10D0138_H0140:299b-8: de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro
K10D0138_H0140:299b-9: // de nas g-yog mo lnga brgya tsam de dag bdud sdig can gyi drung nas dong pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:299b-10: de nas bdud sdig can rab tu khros te de 'di snyam du sems so //
K10D0138_H0140:299b-11: bdag gis yang 'di 'dra ba'i bdud kyi stobs kyi
K10D0138_H0140:299b-12: yul drag po dran par byas te; ci nas bdag
K10D0138_H0140:299b-13: gis g-yog mo de dag phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams
K10D0138_H0140:299b-14: cad 'khrul nas dge sbyong goo ta ma mi mthong
K10D0138_H0140:299b-15: zhing slar yang bdag gi gnas su 'ong bar nam
K10D0138_H0140:299b-16: mkha' 'di dag thams cad du rnam par 'thor rlung
K10D0138_H0140:299b-17: dang / rlung nag po chen pos kun tu khyab par bya'o //
K10D0138_H0140:299b-18: snyam na'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs
K10D0138_H0140:299b-19: kyis rlung cung zad kyang langs par byed ma nus
K10D0138_H0140:299b-20: so // tha na skra'i rtse mo gcig tsam yang bskyod ma nus na /
K10D0138_H0140:300a-0: de nas yang bdud sdig can rab tu khros shing sdug bsngal te yid @300a *//
K10D0138_H0140:300a-1: mi bde zhing yid la gcags nas du zhing skad chen pos rang gi bu dang /
K10D0138_H0140:300a-2: tshogs kyi 'khor la bos te bdud kyi gnas thams cad sgras gang bar byas so //
K10D0138_H0140:300a-3: sdug ba'i bu dang tshogs kyi 'khor rnams tshur shog cig /
K10D0138_H0140:300a-4: nga ni bdag yul rang gi rdzu 'phrul stobs las nyams //
K10D0138_H0140:300a-5: sh'akya'i bu 'di sgyu ldan g-yo can ngag 'jam la //
K10D0138_H0140:300a-6: khong nas rang bzhin dug sdong 'dra ba 'dir skyes so //
K10D0138_H0140:300a-7: de nas sgra des bdud kyi g-yog mo dang /
K10D0138_H0140:300a-8: bdud kyi bu mo de dag thams cad dang /
K10D0138_H0140:300a-9: bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa thams
K10D0138_H0140:300a-10: cad rings pa'i gzugs kyis myur du lhags nas bdud
K10D0138_H0140:300a-11: sdig can gyi mdun du 'khod pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:300a-12: 'khor de'i nang nas bdud kyi bu rgyal ba'i blo
K10D0138_H0140:300a-13: gros zhes bya ba des thal mo sbyar te 'di
K10D0138_H0140:300a-15: ci slad thugs khros rab tu 'khrugs shing thugs mi dgyes //
K10D0138_H0140:300a-16: sreg bskal deng 'dir ma byung 'di nas khyod ma 'phos //
K10D0138_H0140:300a-17: 'di na khyod lhag dgra ni su yang ma mchis na //
K10D0138_H0140:300a-18: khyod ci rmongs par gyur tam ci slad gzhan du dgongs //
K10D0138_H0140:300a-20: sh'akya'i bu pho dmangs phal shing gi grib ma 'dug pa ma mthong ngam //
K10D0138_H0140:300a-21: ci phyir 'di na khyod kyi mdun na stobs dang ldan pa'i dgra med smras //
K10D0138_H0140:300b-0: stobs gcig ldan pa g-yo can de yis thams @300b cad rnams ba du mar bslus //
K10D0138_H0140:300b-1: bdag cag bu dang sder bcas me lce 'bar dang bcas pa'i me yis bsregs //
K10D0138_H0140:300b-2: 'jig rten 'di na skyes bu gtso bo dpal dang
K10D0138_H0140:300b-3: brjod pa rnam grags pa; ;mkhas pa bstan bcos snyan
K10D0138_H0140:300b-4: dang gas mang po byed brtson mthun par myur bar
K10D0138_H0140:300b-5: yang // chos kyi kyo ba btang gis drangs te sh'akya'i bu 'di'i skyabs deng song //
K10D0138_H0140:300b-6: lus mdzes g-yo can blo gros ldan 'di nga yi dgrar ni rab tu gnad //
K10D0138_H0140:300b-7: rab tu sdug pa'i g-yog mo de dag snying rje med pas nga bor te //
K10D0138_H0140:300b-8: nga la dpang btsugs nas ni de ring dge sbyong de yi skyabs su dong //
K10D0138_H0140:300b-9: gal te bdag cag myur bsgrims stobs chen 'di deng thal bar ma byas na //
K10D0138_H0140:300b-10: g-yo dang sgyu srid pa gsum po de dag ma lus stong par byed //
K10D0138_H0140:300b-11: de nas bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas
K10D0138_H0140:300b-12: pa de dag thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar te
K10D0138_H0140:300b-16: stobs kyi yul gyi mthu dang /
K10D0138_H0140:300b-17: rnam par sprul pa de dag thams cad bstan te
K10D0138_H0140:300b-18: sh'akya'i bu 'di gal te thal bar bgyid nus pa
K10D0138_H0140:300b-21: de ltar ma nus na ni /
K10D0138_H0140:300b-23: yab nyid kyi mngon sum du gyur pa lags te /
K10D0138_H0140:300b-24: gang bdag cag sde chen pos yongs su bskor ba lags te /
K10D0138_H0140:301a-0: sngar sh'akya'i bu gcig pu gnyis su med pa 'dis rdzu 'phrul gyi @301a *//
K10D0138_H0140:301a-1: stobs kyis rab tu pham par bgyis na /
K10D0138_H0140:301a-2: da g-yog mang por gyur pa lta ci smos /
K10D0138_H0140:301a-3: bdud sdig can gyis smras pa /
K10D0138_H0140:301a-5: dengs la gal te dge sbyong goo ta ma 'di gsod nus na /
K10D0138_H0140:301a-7: ci ste ma nus na'ang bdag cag gi gnas kyang bsrung gi /
K10D0138_H0140:301a-9: de nas bdud kyi 'khor dkrigs phrag bcu gnyis pho de dag de nas 'phags te /
K10D0138_H0140:301a-10: 'di nas steng du dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong
K10D0138_H0140:301a-11: gi bar du bkang nas de 'dra ba'i bdud kyi
K10D0138_H0140:301a-12: stobs kyi yul gyi rdzu 'phrul drag po bsten te
K10D0138_H0140:301a-13: / gang gling bzhi pa'i nam mkha' thams cad sprin nag po chen po dang /
K10D0138_H0140:301a-14: rlung nag po chen po dang /
K10D0138_H0140:301a-15: skar mdas bkang nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab la'ang
K10D0138_H0140:301a-16: lag gis brdabs te gling bzhi ba thams cad rab
K10D0138_H0140:301a-17: tu g-yos par byas nas shin tu 'jigs pa'i sgra
K10D0138_H0140:301a-21: gnod sbyin dang; gnod sbyin chen po dag gis sa
K10D0138_H0140:301a-22: chen po brag dang rir bcas pa thams cad dang
K10D0138_H0140:301a-23: ldan pa dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang g-yos par rig /
K10D0138_H0140:301a-25: mtsho chen po dang; 'bab chu dang /
K10D0138_H0140:301a-28: rgya mtsho chen po rnams kyang 'khrugs par rig nas nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod do //
K10D0138_H0140:301b-0: bdud kyi 'khor de @301b dag ni; ri rab kyi
K10D0138_H0140:301b-1: zom la 'khod nas dpag tshad tsam gyi rdo'i char
K10D0138_H0140:301b-2: mngon par sprul te nam mkha' las kun tu 'bebs
K10D0138_H0140:301b-15: shin tu rad rod can dang; sra ba /
K10D0138_H0140:301b-18: rno ba'i char rab tu sprul te kun tu phab bo //
K10D0138_H0140:301b-19: zhes de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das bdud kyi 'khor rnam
K10D0138_H0140:301b-20: par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
K10D0138_H0140:301b-23: mtshon cha de dag thams cad ni /
K10D0138_H0140:301b-24: lha'i me tog autpa la dang /
K10D0138_H0140:301b-29: mand'a ra ba chen po'i me tog gi char chen por byin gyis brlabs /
K10D0138_H0140:301b-30: yul aangga ma ga dhar skar mda' ltung ba ni /
K10D0138_H0140:301b-31: spos kyi char chen por byin gyis brlabs /
K10D0138_H0140:301b-33: rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs su byin gyis brlabs te /
K10D0138_H0140:301b-34: 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /
K10D0138_H0140:301b-37: pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra dang /
K10D0138_H0140:301b-38: mngon par shes pa'i sgra dang /
K10D0138_H0140:301b-39: phyir mi ldog pa'i sgra dang; dbang bskur ba'i sgra dang /
K10D0138_H0140:301b-40: bdud bzhi pham par bya ba'i sgra dang /
K10D0138_H0140:301b-41: byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'i sgra dang /
K10D0138_H0140:301b-42: len pa dang bcas pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:302a-0: len pa med pa'i bar gyi sgrar @302a *//
K10D0138_H0140:302a-4: rlung thams cad kyang rab tu zhi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:302a-5: gang gling bzhi pa 'di na rtsva dang /
K10D0138_H0140:302a-10: ri ci yod pa de dag thams cad ni /
K10D0138_H0140:302a-11: rin po che sna bdun du byin gyis brlabs so //
K10D0138_H0140:302a-12: bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor bltar mi mthong ba dang ldan pa ni /
K10D0138_H0140:302a-13: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du skus dbang mdzad do //
K10D0138_H0140:302a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan re re las kyang 'di 'dra ba'i 'od byung ste /
K10D0138_H0140:302a-15: 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
K10D0138_H0140:302a-16: gyi khams snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to
K10D0138_H0140:302a-17: // stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lha dang /
K10D0138_H0140:302a-32: gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das mthong ba nas lha dang /
K10D0138_H0140:302b-0: nam mkha' la @302b 'khod pa brgya stong mang pos ni /
K10D0138_H0140:302b-1: me tog gtor cing bstod nas bskor ba byas so //
K10D0138_H0140:302b-2: sems can dmyal ba pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:302b-4: gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa mi 'khrugs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po ni /
K10D0138_H0140:302b-6: dge ba'i rtsa bsngon bskyed pa dran nas sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0138_H0140:302b-7: zhes byas te ngan song de dag nas shi 'phos nas lhar skyes so //
K10D0138_H0140:302b-8: bdud kyi sde de'i nang nas bdud kyi bu nyi
K10D0138_H0140:302b-9: khri'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das
K10D0138_H0140:302b-10: kyi cho 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu mthong nas
K10D0138_H0140:302b-11: bcom ldan 'das la rab tu dga' bar gyur te
K10D0138_H0140:302b-12: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin
K10D0138_H0140:302b-13: pa dang / bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya dang
K10D0138_H0140:302b-14: lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
K10D0138_H0140:302b-15: bos phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su
K10D0138_H0140:302b-17: rnam dag sku mnga' mchog tu gzugs bzang pa //
K10D0138_H0140:302b-18: ye shes rgya mtsho gser gyi lhun po 'dra //
K10D0138_H0140:302b-19: grags pa 'jig rten bkram nas lha ma me ba //
K10D0138_H0140:302b-20: mngon po khyod nyid la ni skyabs su mchi //
K10D0138_H0140:302b-21: rab tu lam stor rnam par mig zum la //
K10D0138_H0140:302b-22: khyod ni 'jig rten sgron ma nyi ma 'dra //
K10D0138_H0140:302b-23: gzhan gyis mi thub srog chags rtsa lag gcig /
K10D0138_H0140:302b-24: ded dpon khyod la skyabs su rab tu mchi //
K10D0138_H0140:302b-25: shin tu tshogs bsags ye shes 'byor ba'i mdzod //
K10D0138_H0140:303a-1: bzhin gzod nas rnam grol thugs //
K10D0138_H0140:303a-2: thugs rje bsam pa yid 'ong 'jam pa'i gsung //
K10D0138_H0140:303a-3: don kun grub pa khyod la skyabs su mchi //
K10D0138_H0140:303a-4: 'khor ba'i dgon pa las ni khyod thar mdzad //
K10D0138_H0140:303a-5: tshogs pa las kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu ston //
K10D0138_H0140:303a-6: byams la gnas shing mchog gi cho ga mkhyen //
K10D0138_H0140:303a-7: thugs rje gnas pa'i skyabs su rab tu mchi; ;sgyu ma smig rgyu chu zla 'dra ba yi //
K10D0138_H0140:303a-8: sred pa la ni yul gyi gnas kyis chags //
K10D0138_H0140:303a-9: mi shes nad sel 'jig rten rnams kyi mgon //
K10D0138_H0140:303a-10: sman pa'i rgyal po khyod la skyabs su mchi //
K10D0138_H0140:303a-11: chu bo bzhi dbus zam par gyur pa khyod //
K10D0138_H0140:303a-12: nor bdun 'phags pa'i tshul gyis rab sgrol ba //
K10D0138_H0140:303a-13: yang dag lam ston 'jig rten rtsa lag po //
K10D0138_H0140:303a-14: thugs rje ldan pa khyod la 'dir mchod do //
K10D0138_H0140:303a-15: blo mchog khyod la bdag cag bzod par gsol //
K10D0138_H0140:303a-16: khyod la bdag cag yid kyis gnod bsam pa //
K10D0138_H0140:303a-17: mgon po dpa' bos nongs pa bzod par gsol //
K10D0138_H0140:303a-18: khyod ni 'gro ba'i rtsa lag gcig pu gtso //
K10D0138_H0140:303a-19: bdag cag bdud kyi phyogs rnams rab spangs te //
K10D0138_H0140:303a-20: byang chub mchog gi sems ni bskyed par bgyi; ;sems can ma lus thams cad mgron du gnyer //
K10D0138_H0140:303a-21: bdag cag gis ni byang chub mchog thob bgyi //
K10D0138_H0140:303a-22: ci nas bdag cag pha rol phyin spyod par //
K10D0138_H0140:303b-0: bdag cag @303b rnams la spyod pa rgya cher ston //
K10D0138_H0140:303b-1: gzhan ma yin gsung chos ni du rnams dag /
K10D0138_H0140:303b-2: ldan na byang chub rab tu thob par 'gyur //
K10D0138_H0140:303b-3: me tog gang gis khyod la mngon gtor ba //
K10D0138_H0140:303b-4: phyogs kun du yang de dag gdugs gyur te //
K10D0138_H0140:303b-5: dus kun bde ba'i 'byung gnas zhing du ni //
K10D0138_H0140:303b-6: rkang gnyis mchog gi spyi bor 'dug gyur cig /
K10D0138_H0140:303b-7: de nas bdud kyi bu mo de dag dang /
K10D0138_H0140:303b-8: bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de
K10D0138_H0140:303b-9: dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la me tog
K10D0138_H0140:303b-11: me tog sil ma de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi
K10D0138_H0140:303b-12: rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus gangg'a'i klung bye ba khrag khrig
K10D0138_H0140:303b-13: brgya stong gi bye ma las 'das pa'i me tog
K10D0138_H0140:303b-14: gi gdugs kun tu 'dug par gyur te /
K10D0138_H0140:303b-15: me tog gi gdugs de dag kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs
K10D0138_H0140:303b-16: rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa
K10D0138_H0140:303b-17: thams cad kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng
K10D0138_H0140:303b-19: bdud kyi bu mo de dag dang /
K10D0138_H0140:303b-20: bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de
K10D0138_H0140:303b-21: dag gis kyang so so nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
K10D0138_H0140:303b-22: kyi zhing grangs med dpag tu med pa thams cad
K10D0138_H0140:303b-23: na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tsho la
K10D0138_H0140:303b-24: gzhes te chos kyang 'chad pa 'khor gyis yongs su
K10D0138_H0140:304a-0: lhang nger bzhugs pa'i dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng gi bar @304a *//
K10D0138_H0140:304a-1: snang la me tog gi gdugs de dag 'dug par gyur pa mthong zhing /
K10D0138_H0140:304a-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang kha dog mtshungs pa /
K10D0138_H0140:304a-4: gzugs 'dra ba mtshungs par snang ba sha stag la /
K10D0138_H0140:304a-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag sengge'i khri tha dad cing 'khor tha dad la /
K10D0138_H0140:304a-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i nyi tshe tha dad par mthong ste /
K10D0138_H0140:304a-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gsung brjod pa ni /
K10D0138_H0140:304a-9: bdud kyi 'khor de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus
K10D0138_H0140:304a-10: 'di lta bu'i cho 'phrul mthong nas mchog tu dga'
K10D0138_H0140:304a-11: ba dang / mos pa skyes te bcom ldan 'das
K10D0138_H0140:304a-12: kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas chos mnyan
K10D0138_H0140:304a-14: de nas bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas
K10D0138_H0140:304a-15: pa de dag las dkrigs phrag bcu phyir log nas
K10D0138_H0140:304a-16: bdud kyi gnas su de lta bu'i ngo mtshar bdud
K10D0138_H0140:304a-17: sdig can la rgya cher bzlas te /
K10D0138_H0140:304a-18: dge sbyong goo ta ma de'i ba spu'i khung bu
K10D0138_H0140:304a-19: gcig kyang bdag cag gis gzhig par ma nus na
K10D0138_H0140:304a-21: de'i steng du bdud nyi khri de'i skyabs su dong
K10D0138_H0140:304a-22: ste chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun na 'khod do
K10D0138_H0140:304b-0: // de nas @304b bdud sdig can rab tu khros
K10D0138_H0140:304b-1: te sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas yid la
K10D0138_H0140:304b-2: gcags te des 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0138_H0140:304b-3: sh'akya'i bu ni ji srid brlags par ma byas pa //
K10D0138_H0140:304b-4: de srid bar du nga yi dpal song slar mi 'ong //
K10D0138_H0140:304b-5: sh'akya'i bu 'di ji ltar de ring gsad snyam ste //
K10D0138_H0140:304b-6: bdag cag gzhan la yid mi rtog cing mi smra 'dug /
K10D0138_H0140:304b-7: de nas bdud sdig can yid mi bde zhing mya ngan gyi khang pa na 'dug go /
K10D0138_H0140:304b-8: 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las /
K10D0138_H0140:304b-9: bdud spa bkong ba'i le'u ste dang po'o ////
K10D0138_H0140:304b-10: bam po gnyis pa; de nas bdud kyi bu mo dang /
K10D0138_H0140:304b-11: bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de
K10D0138_H0140:304b-12: dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
K10D0138_H0140:304b-14: bdag cag ni; 'di lta bu'i theg pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:304b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thabs dang /
K10D0138_H0140:304b-22: ye shes kyi bar du ldan pa ngo mtshar to //
K10D0138_H0140:304b-25: skyes bu gang zag sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu
K10D0138_H0140:304b-26: mi mchi zhing myur du bla na med pa yang
K10D0138_H0140:304b-27: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
K10D0138_H0140:304b-28: 'tshang rgya / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0138_H0140:305a-1: las skyes bu gang zag la la sdig pa'i grogs
K10D0138_H0140:305a-2: po'i lag tu mi 'gro zhing myur du bla na
K10D0138_H0140:305a-3: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
K10D0138_H0140:305a-7: 'di la rigs kyi bu chos thams cad la mchog tu mi 'dzin cing /
K10D0138_H0140:305a-11: mi gnas; nye bar mi le na /

K10D0138_H0140:336a-3: de'i tshe 'khor thams cad rab tu dngangs par bya
K10D0138_H0140:336a-4: ba'i phyir skad drag cing che la 'jigs pa'i sgra
K10D0138_H0140:336a-7: yang stobs chen po'i drag shul gyis lag pa gnyis
K10D0138_H0140:336a-8: sa chen po la brdabs te rab tu bskyod par
K10D0138_H0140:336a-9: 'dod na / reg par yang ma nus te mi dmigs so //
K10D0138_H0140:336a-12: la la zhig nam mkha' la rdob par 'dod na
K10D0138_H0140:336a-13: mi dmigs pa de bzhin du bdud sdig can gyis
K10D0138_H0140:336a-14: mthong yang reg par mi rung zhing mi dmigs nas
K10D0138_H0140:336a-16: ci nas sems can 'dud pa rnams brtags te sems rnam par 'khrug par bya'o //
K10D0138_H0140:336a-18: sems can de dag mthong yang mi dmigs shing reg par yang ma nus so //
K10D0138_H0140:336a-19: de nas bdud sdig can rab tu du zhing sangs
K10D0138_H0140:336a-20: rgyas kyi mthus de'i lus shing ljon pa bzhin du
K10D0138_H0140:336a-21: 'dar te gdong mchi ma can gyi sa phyogs bzhir
K10D0138_H0140:336a-22: blta zhing 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0138_H0140:336a-23: dge sbyong gis ni 'gro kun bsdu phyir de ring sgyu 'di byas //
K10D0138_H0140:336a-24: 'di ltar bdag ni mdun 'dir bslad bzhin skad cig myos par song //
K10D0138_H0140:336a-25: yul dang rang gi stobs las nyams shing bdag gi srog kyang zad //
K10D0138_H0140:336a-26: des bskrad brlags par ma gyur bar du bdag gnas myur du 'gro /
K10D0138_H0140:336a-27: bdag gi gnas su 'gro bar 'dod na der yang 'gro bar ma nus te //
K10D0138_H0140:336b-0: rab tu skrag @336b cing dus nas 'di snyam du sems so //
K10D0138_H0140:336b-1: bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs zad de bdag dge
K10D0138_H0140:336b-2: sbyong goo ta ma 'di'i dbang du song du 'ong
K10D0138_H0140:336b-3: / dgra 'di'i mdun du bdag gi srog zad par 'gyur du 'ong gi /
K10D0138_H0140:336b-5: ci nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing na gnas pa'i sems
K10D0138_H0140:336b-6: can gcig gis kyang bdag 'chi ba'i dus byed pa
K10D0138_H0140:336b-7: mi mthong bar sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mdzed kyi
K10D0138_H0140:336b-8: pha rol tu 'chi pa'i dus bya'o //
K10D0138_H0140:336b-10: 'on kyang mi snang bar bya ba'am /
K10D0138_H0140:336b-11: phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su 'bros kyang ma nus te /
K10D0138_H0140:336b-12: de nyid du mgul ba bcing ba lngas bcings par
K10D0138_H0140:336b-13: bdag gis mthong nas rab tu khros shing skrag ste
K10D0138_H0140:336b-14: skad chen por du zhing 'di skad ces smras so
K10D0138_H0140:336b-15: // kyi hud bu dang gnyen bshes sdug pa khyed rnams phyis mi mthong ngo //
K10D0138_H0140:336b-17: de nas bdud dbyangs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba
K10D0138_H0140:336b-18: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i cha byad du 'dug par gyur
K10D0138_H0140:336b-19: te / des bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0138_H0140:336b-20: ci phyir khyed deng mya ngan yid kyis du gdong sgra chen 'bod //
K10D0138_H0140:336b-21: 'gro ba kun gtso thub mchog skyabs su ma 'jigs myur du song //
K10D0138_H0140:336b-22: 'jig rten rnams kyi mgon skyabs dpung gnyen sdug bsngal gsum sel ba //
K10D0138_H0140:336b-23: 'di la bsnyen bkur zhi 'gro bde ba thob par 'gyur yang dag /
K10D0138_H0140:336b-24: de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du bdag gi
K10D0138_H0140:336b-25: tshig snyan pas dge sbyong goo ta ma la skyabs
K10D0138_H0140:336b-26: su song la / bcings pa 'di las bdag grol par bya'o //
K10D0138_H0140:337a-1: bdud sdig can gyis phyogs gang na bcom ldan 'das
K10D0138_H0140:337a-2: bzhugs ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung
K10D0138_H0140:337a-4: gang zag gi mchog skye ba dang rga ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:337a-6: 'chi ba las rab tu thar par mdzad pa de la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0138_H0140:337a-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la bdag skyabs su mchi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:337a-9: thub mchog myur du 'jigs chen mi bzad bcing ba 'di las khrol //
K10D0138_H0140:337a-10: de ring slan chad bde gshegs gtso bo mchog skyabs bdag mchis te //
K10D0138_H0140:337a-11: gti mug gis ni bdag ldongs khyod la khros shing nongs chen gyis //
K10D0138_H0140:337a-12: mngon sum khyod bzhag spyan sngar de dag so sor bshags par bgyi //
K10D0138_H0140:337a-13: gang gi tshe bdud sdig can gyis tshig snyan pas
K10D0138_H0140:337a-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su song ba
K10D0138_H0140:337a-15: de'i tshen bdag grol ba snyam du shes so //
K10D0138_H0140:337a-16: yang gang gi tshe 'khor 'di nas bdag 'gro'o //
K10D0138_H0140:337a-17: snyam du bsam pa de'i tshe'ang mgul ba bcing ba lngas bcings par bdag gis shes te /
K10D0138_H0140:337a-18: gang gi tshe gang du'ang 'gro bar ma nus pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la mgon dang /
K10D0138_H0140:337a-19: skyabs su sems bskyed nas yang bdag nyid grol bar shes so //
K10D0138_H0140:337a-20: lan bdun gyi bar du bdag bcings pa dang grol bar shes te de nyid du 'dug go /
K10D0138_H0140:337a-21: 'dus pa rin po che tog gi gzungs las /
K10D0138_H0140:337a-22: bdud btul ba'i le'u zhes bya ste gsum pa'o ////
K10D0138_H0140:337b-0: bam po @337b bzhi pa; gong du smos pa'i bar du ste /
K10D0138_H0140:337b-1: nyan thos chen po bzhi po de dag rgyal po'i
K10D0138_H0140:337b-2: khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir
K10D0138_H0140:337b-3: sod ba bdud gzhon nu de dag gis dge sbyong
K10D0138_H0140:337b-6: gar byos shig ces sbyod pa ma yin pa byed
K10D0138_H0140:337b-7: du bcug nas nyan thos chen po de dag kyang
K10D0138_H0140:337b-8: srang gi dbus na rgyug cing mya ngan las 'das
K10D0138_H0140:337b-9: pa'i lam gyi tshig dang ldan pa'i glu'i dbyangs kyis
K10D0138_H0140:337b-10: gang gi tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa de'i
K10D0138_H0140:337b-11: tshe sa chen po 'di rab tu g-yos so //
K10D0138_H0140:337b-12: skad cig de nyid la lha dang /
K10D0138_H0140:337b-19: lto 'phye chen po brgya stong mang po bcom ldan
K10D0138_H0140:337b-20: 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnams gdong mchi
K10D0138_H0140:337b-21: ma can gyis 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0138_H0140:337b-22: chos kyi kha lo sgyur mchog mya ngan med bzhugs kyang //
K10D0138_H0140:337b-23: rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'di lta bu yi gnas gyur te //
K10D0138_H0140:337b-24: nyan thos de dag la ni kyal ka deng byas pa //
K10D0138_H0140:337b-25: 'gro ba rnams kyis mthong na dad par ga la 'gyur //
K10D0138_H0140:337b-34: srin po bye ba khrag khrig mang po gdong mchi
K10D0138_H0140:337b-35: ma can gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
K10D0138_H0140:337b-36: lhags te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas
K10D0138_H0140:337b-38: da ltar bstan pa 'di yi gnas //
K10D0138_H0140:337b-39: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun gzigs te //
K10D0138_H0140:338a-2: kun mkhyen btang snyoms ma mdzad cig bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
K10D0138_H0140:338a-3: 'di ltar nga nyid der song ste //
K10D0138_H0140:338a-4: bzhon dpung bcas pa'i bdud btul la //
K10D0138_H0140:338a-5: skye bo mang po thams cad kyang //
K10D0138_H0140:338a-7: de nas bdud de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0138_H0140:338a-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab /
K10D0138_H0140:338a-10: bdud kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab /
K10D0138_H0140:338a-11: klu'i yul bsam gyis mi khyab; las rnams kyi las kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K10D0138_H0140:338a-12: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ma stsal tam /
K10D0138_H0140:338a-13: yul thams cad kyi nang na ni /
K10D0138_H0140:338a-14: sangs rgyas kyi yul khyad par du 'phags pa'i mchog lags te /
K10D0138_H0140:338a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan 'di la bzhugs bzhin du
K10D0138_H0140:338a-16: bdud bya ba khrag khrig rab tu pham par mdzad
K10D0138_H0140:338a-17: pa dang / chos kyi phung po bye ba khrag khrig rab tu bstan pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:338a-18: nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho skam pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:338a-19: lta ba'i rgya mo dral ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:338a-20: sems can bye ba khrag khrig ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la gzud par spyod mod kyi /
K10D0138_H0140:338a-21: 'on gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das deng gi dus la gshegs pa'i mi rigs so //
K10D0138_H0140:338a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0138_H0140:338b-0: sems can gyi khams na sems can ji snyed pa de dag @338b thams cad bdud du gyur la /
K10D0138_H0140:338b-1: de dag re re'i bdud kyi stobs dang /
K10D0138_H0140:338b-2: byin gyi rlabs kyang sa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de tsam du gyur te /
K10D0138_H0140:338b-3: de dag thams cad nga la gsad par shom yang
K10D0138_H0140:338b-4: spu'i khung bu gcig tsam la'ang gnod par mi nus
K10D0138_H0140:338b-6: 'di na 'dug bzhin du bdud bye ba khrag khrig rnams rab tu pa ma par bya ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:338b-8: bdud g-yog dang bcas pa 'di ni /
K10D0138_H0140:338b-10: yang nga la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bdud 'di
K10D0138_H0140:338b-11: dag gis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po
K10D0138_H0140:338b-12: thams cad bdud kyi stobs dang /
K10D0138_H0140:338b-14: rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi bkod pas brgyan pas /
K10D0138_H0140:338b-15: de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'gro bar bya ste /
K10D0138_H0140:338b-17: de nas bdud de dag rab tu dga' zhing dad
K10D0138_H0140:338b-18: pa skyes nas bla na med pa yang dag par
K10D0138_H0140:338b-19: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa
K10D0138_H0140:338b-21: ji tsam na gdan las bzhengs par bzhed pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:338b-22: de nas 'od ma'i tshal srung ba'i lha mo mthu
K10D0138_H0140:338b-23: mdzes zhes bya ba des bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
K10D0138_H0140:338b-24: sngar gdong mchi ma can du 'dug nas 'di skad
K10D0138_H0140:338b-25: ces gsol to // bcom ldan de ring gshegs pa'i dus ma lags //
K10D0138_H0140:338b-26: grong khyer 'di dag kun nas bdud kyis gtams //
K10D0138_H0140:338b-27: re re la yang shin tu ma rungs pa //
K10D0138_H0140:338b-28: bye bas smra ba'i sengge bskor cing mchis //
K10D0138_H0140:338b-29: zhe sdang rab 'bar rno ba'i mtshon thogs te //
K10D0138_H0140:339a-2: mgon po rnam pa kun tu deng ma gshegs //
K10D0138_H0140:339a-3: 'jig rten rtsa lag brlags par ma bzhud cig /
K10D0138_H0140:339a-4: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das gdan las bzhengs pa
K10D0138_H0140:339a-5: de'i tshe gtsug lag khang gi lha mo snang ba'i
K10D0138_H0140:339a-6: blo gros zhes bya ba des bcom ldan 'das kyi
K10D0138_H0140:339a-7: zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces
K10D0138_H0140:339a-8: gsol to // sdig can dag ni lnga stong po //
K10D0138_H0140:339a-9: mtshon char bcas pa mchis pa ni //
K10D0138_H0140:339a-10: bsam med de dag khyod la bsngo //
K10D0138_H0140:339a-11: thub chen de ring ma gshegs shig /
K10D0138_H0140:339a-12: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang nas
K10D0138_H0140:339a-13: byung ba de'i che sman gyi lha mo grub pa'i
K10D0138_H0140:339a-14: blo gros zhes bya ba des bcom ldan 'das kyi
K10D0138_H0140:339a-15: zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces
K10D0138_H0140:339a-16: gsol to // 'jig rten sgron ma brlags gyur na //
K10D0138_H0140:339a-17: kyi hud chos kyi lam stor cing //
K10D0138_H0140:339a-18: chos kyi tshul ni rab tu 'jig /
K10D0138_H0140:339a-20: 'jig rten kun na rgya chen chos kyi ro ni nyams par 'gyur //
K10D0138_H0140:339a-21: 'gro ba 'dir ni nyon mongs g-yo can gdug pas shin tu gtams //
K10D0138_H0140:339a-22: sa 'di bde gshegs thub pa'i mchog ni ma rungs 'gyur ba las //
K10D0138_H0140:339a-23: ji ltar shin tu 'byung ba'i mthu ni bdag la ci ma mchis //
K10D0138_H0140:339a-24: khyod brlag bgyi slad 'di na rab tu mi bzad mang po dag /
K10D0138_H0140:339a-25: sdig pa'i chos can ral gri sta re mtshon rnon thogs shing mchis //
K10D0138_H0140:339b-0: bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten bsrung slad bdag gi tshig @339b gsan te //
K10D0138_H0140:339b-1: stobs bcu grub par bzhud de de ring grong khyer ma gshegs shig /
K10D0138_H0140:339b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang gi dang ra nas bzhud pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:339b-3: de na shing gi lha mo 'od 'chang zhes bya
K10D0138_H0140:339b-4: ba de snying rje snying brtse bar du zhing bcom
K10D0138_H0140:339b-5: ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas
K10D0138_H0140:339b-7: thams cad don grub thub pa yid bzhin rdzogs khyod
K10D0138_H0140:339b-8: ma rungs gyur na ni; ;mgon po khams gsum 'di
K10D0138_H0140:339b-9: dag de'u re mig ni stor bar 'gyur //
K10D0138_H0140:339b-10: nam mkha' 'di la sbrul gyi rked chings rno ba'i mda' dang mtshon thogs shing //
K10D0138_H0140:339b-11: khyod dkrongs slad du kha nas me 'bar rgyu yid ni der ma gshegs //
K10D0138_H0140:339b-12: de nas sgo khang gi lha mo 'od zer chu'i
K10D0138_H0140:339b-13: lha zhes bya ba de sgra cher du zhing bcom
K10D0138_H0140:339b-14: ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas
K10D0138_H0140:339b-16: grong khyer bzang po 'di na bram zer ming btags stong phrag nyi shu po //
K10D0138_H0140:339b-17: mda' dang spu gri mtshon cha 'bar ba thogs te snying rje med par blta //
K10D0138_H0140:339b-18: gcig pas gcig mi bzad pa snying rje med pa stong phrag nyi shu rnams //
K10D0138_H0140:339b-19: khyod dkrongs slad du 'di na mchis kyi gtsang ma'i zhal ni ma gshegs shig /
K10D0138_H0140:339b-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das sgo khang du byon pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:339b-21: der rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer srung ba'i lha
K10D0138_H0140:339b-22: mo ta ma la'i snying po zhes bya ba de
K10D0138_H0140:339b-23: nam mkha' las sgra cher du zhing /
K10D0138_H0140:339b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rings par song ste
K10D0138_H0140:339b-25: phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
K10D0138_H0140:340a-2: bcom ldan shul 'di sengge rnga mo glang chen smyon pas bsgor //
K10D0138_H0140:340a-3: dge slong rnams la gtse slad bdud kyis rnam mang gnod pa bgyid //
K10D0138_H0140:340a-4: sa 'dir ston pa khyod dkrongs slad du mu stegs gzhan yang brtson //
K10D0138_H0140:340a-5: sprin dbyangs 'od 'bar lha klu thugs brtse'i slad du ma gshegs shig /
K10D0138_H0140:340a-6: bcom ldan bdud btul khyod kyis bstan pa rnam zhig dang //
K10D0138_H0140:340a-7: sgyu ma bgyis pa mi mthun gdong can bdud mthong nas //
K10D0138_H0140:340a-8: lha mi klu dang mi 'am ci yi dbang po rnams //
K10D0138_H0140:340a-9: kun 'dus mi dga' skrag nas shin tu rnam par 'khrugs //
K10D0138_H0140:340a-10: dam chos cher zhig pa dang 'jig rten 'khrugs gyur dang //
K10D0138_H0140:340a-11: nam mkha' skar ma'i 'od stong nyi zla gyur mthong nas //
K10D0138_H0140:340a-12: 'gro mchog kye ma mi bzad klad pa deng drag rdob //
K10D0138_H0140:340a-13: bde gshegs ma rungs 'gyur bar kun dogs kyi hud mchi //
K10D0138_H0140:340a-14: mthong ba'i nyi ma 'di nyams shing //
K10D0138_H0140:340a-15: chos kyi sgron ma zad par 'gyur //
K10D0138_H0140:340a-16: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grongs pas brlag /
K10D0138_H0140:340a-17: chos kyi chu yang skam par 'gyur //
K10D0138_H0140:340a-18: dam chos spyod pa 'jig rten du //
K10D0138_H0140:340a-19: ma rungs 'gyur ba nyer gnas tshe //
K10D0138_H0140:340a-20: mi dge ba yi bdud rnams kyang //
K10D0138_H0140:340a-22: de nas lha mo des bcom ldan 'das phyir ldog
K10D0138_H0140:340a-23: par ma mthong nas gdong mchi ma can gyis yang
K10D0138_H0140:340a-25: thub pa 'jig rten kun la gzigs su gsol //
K10D0138_H0140:340a-26: smra mchog de ring brlag par ma bzhud cig /
K10D0138_H0140:340b-0: bdag gi grong du ma @340b rungs khyod gyur na;/
K10D0138_H0140:340b-1: 'jig rten gsum gyis rtag smad 'gyur du mchi //
K10D0138_H0140:340b-2: 'dren pa bdag gi tshig gson sems can mchog /
K10D0138_H0140:340b-3: bdag gi grong du brlag par deng ma bzhud //
K10D0138_H0140:340b-4: sems can thugs brtse'i slad du 'dir gzhes te //
K10D0138_H0140:340b-5: sems can skye bas gtses pa 'jigs thar mdzod //
K10D0138_H0140:340b-6: dam pa brnyes nas sgrol bar rab 'gyur bar //
K10D0138_H0140:340b-7: sngon gyi dam bcas de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs //
K10D0138_H0140:340b-8: sems can mang po sdug bsngal du mas gdungs //
K10D0138_H0140:340b-9: srog chags rnams kyi gtso bo dbugs phyung zhig /
K10D0138_H0140:340b-10: sku mchog bskal pa bye ba mang por bzhugs //
K10D0138_H0140:340b-11: kye ma 'dod la chags pa'i byis pa'i sde //
K10D0138_H0140:340b-12: de rnams zhi bgyid slad du chos lam shod //
K10D0138_H0140:340b-13: skye mchod dbang po don ni rang bzhin stong //
K10D0138_H0140:340b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das sgo khang du gshegs pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:340b-15: de nas sa'i lha mo gzi brjid che ba gzi
K10D0138_H0140:340b-16: brjid che ba'i lha mo khri dang lhan cig skra
K10D0138_H0140:340b-17: bshig cing gdong mchi ma can gyis bcom ldan 'das
K10D0138_H0140:340b-18: kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas 'di
K10D0138_H0140:340b-20: rab tu sbyin la dgongs shing khyod kyis ni //
K10D0138_H0140:340b-21: rgya mtsho bzhin gtams pa yi khrag stsal cing //
K10D0138_H0140:340b-22: dbu dang rus pa khor yug ri rab tsam //

K10D0138_H0140:340b-27: de bzhin nad pa dag la 'dod sman stsal //
K10D0138_H0140:341a-0: rang byung mchog rab la ni mchod pa @341a *//
K10D0138_H0140:341a-1: mdzad; ;khyod kyis bag yod par yang tshul khrims bsrungs //

K10D0138_H0140:341a-7: lam mchog ston pa sangs rgyas nyid gyur cig /
K10D0138_H0140:341a-8: chu po chen po las ni 'gro ba bsgral //

K10D0138_H0140:341a-10: sdug bsngal ma lus par ni bsal par bya //

K10D0138_H0140:341a-12: sems can de dag dgos pa yongs rdzogs shing //
K10D0138_H0140:341a-13: byang chub dam pa la ni shin tu khod //

K10D0138_H0140:341a-15: tshul khrims thos bshig mgon pos bzod par mdzod //
K10D0138_H0140:341a-16: 'di dag sgrol tshig dam bcas dgongs su gsol //
K10D0138_H0140:341a-17: bskal pa bye ba mang por chos bstan te //

K10D0138_H0140:341a-21: 'jig rten gsum po 'di na 'ga' ma mchis //

K10D0138_H0140:341b-0: @341b skad cig de nyid la lha dang /
K10D0138_H0140:341b-3: srin po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po
K10D0138_H0140:341b-4: nam mkha' la rgyu zhing gdong mchi ma can gyis
K10D0138_H0140:341b-6: bdag cag rnams kyis bde gshegs sngon mthong ba //
K10D0138_H0140:341b-7: zhi ba'i dus la shin tu slob ma dul //
K10D0138_H0140:341b-8: chos rnams rgya cher ston pa mdzad pa na //
K10D0138_H0140:341b-9: de la de lta bu yi bgegs ma byung //
K10D0138_H0140:341b-10: ston pa 'di ni shin tu dus ngan la; ;rgya chen blo yis rang byung nyid brnyes te //

K10D0138_H0140:341b-13: smra ba'i sengge 'di na bzhugs bzhin du //

K10D0138_H0140:341b-15: de ltar chos rnams rab tu 'jig par bgyid //

K10D0138_H0140:341b-17: de nas lha mo gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0138_H0140:341b-18: sngon gyi rgyal ba 'jig rten phan brtson pa //

K10D0138_H0140:341b-20: 'di ni gang du gshegs pa der yang bskor //
K10D0138_H0140:341b-21: de ring ma rungs bar ni gyur ta re //
K10D0138_H0140:341b-22: de nas yang lha mo gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0138_H0140:341b-23: ded dpon 'dir ni thugs rje'i slad //

K10D0138_H0140:341b-25: de ni de ring grong khyer 'dir //

K10D0138_H0140:342a-0: @342a *// khrag khrig brgya stong gdong la mchi ma zag cing
K10D0138_H0140:342a-1: ngom zung nag pa dag nam mkha'i ngos kyi lam

K10D0138_H0140:342a-31: mu tig gi phreng ba dang /

K10D0138_H0140:342a-37: sdig med khyod kyis sangs rgyas mdzad pa nyung du mdzad //
K10D0138_H0140:342a-38: lha dang mi rnams dbang du mdzad pa shin tu nyung //
K10D0138_H0140:342b-0: shin @342b tu yun ring chos rnams ston cing khyod bzhugs pa //
K10D0138_H0140:342b-1: srid pa gsum gyi rgya mtsho 'di las 'gro ba sgrol //
K10D0138_H0140:342b-2: dge ba'i las rnams bgyid cing sa bon yongs smin te //

K10D0138_H0140:342b-6: 'gro ba dgon pa'i dbus song 'khyams gyur cing //
K10D0138_H0140:342b-7: 'khor ba'i dgon par shin tu lam stor ba //

K10D0138_H0140:342b-12: rlabs chen thugs mnga' ring du bzhugs su gsol //

K10D0138_H0140:342b-21: de slad bdag cag bde ba kun dang ldan //
K10D0138_H0140:342b-22: bsod nams 'byung gnas 'dir brlag ma gyur cig /

K10D0138_H0140:342b-24: khrig brgya stong mang po dag de nyid du 'dus
K10D0138_H0140:342b-25: par gyur te / de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //

K10D0138_H0140:343a-1: pa rlabs chen thugs mnga' nam yang ni //

K10D0138_H0140:343a-9: sngon byung ba ni bdud kyi sde gcig yin te de dag dpung mi che //

K10D0138_H0140:344b-13: chos kyi sgron ma rab tu 'bar bar mdzad do //

K10D0138_H0140:345a-5: mand'a ra ba chen po dang /
K10D0138_H0140:345a-7: pa ru sha ka chen po dang /
K10D0138_H0140:345a-9: manydzu sha ka chen po dang /

K10D0138_H0140:350a-9: rang gi sems la the tshom spongs //

K10D0138_H0140:350a-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa
K10D0138_H0140:350a-13: de dag gsungs ma thag tu de nas drang srong
K10D0138_H0140:350a-14: skar ma la dga' ba g-yog dang bcas pas bcom
K10D0138_H0140:350a-15: ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang /
K10D0138_H0140:350a-17: spyod lam du zhugs par mthong nas sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mngon sum du gyur to //
K10D0138_H0140:350a-18: de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas ting nge 'dzin gang thob na /
K10D0138_H0140:350a-19: byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo bzhin
K10D0138_H0140:350a-20: du 'dug nas ting nge 'dzin thams cad la lta
K10D0138_H0140:350a-21: zhing gzhan la rag las pa med de /
K10D0138_H0140:350a-22: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba /
K10D0138_H0140:350a-23: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rin po che tog ces bya ba thob bo //
K10D0138_H0140:350a-24: de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas bcom
K10D0138_H0140:350a-25: ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas lag
K10D0138_H0140:350a-26: pa gnyis na me tog thogs te bcom ldan 'das
K10D0138_H0140:350a-27: la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par
K10D0138_H0140:350b-0: bstod do // yon tan mtha' @350b yas 'jig rten mgon po bden pa gsung ba legs bzhugs pa //
K10D0138_H0140:350b-1: khyed kyi ye shes spyan gyi 'od zer gyis ni 'jig rten kun snang mdzad //
K10D0138_H0140:350b-2: rtag tu sems can kun gyi slad du dpa' bo byams pas mngon 'phags pa //
K10D0138_H0140:350b-3: sems can snying po chags pa zad pa 'dren pa khyod la deng phyag 'tshal //
K10D0138_H0140:350b-4: gser gyi kha dog gser dang 'dra ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis bsil gyur ba'i [?]//
K10D0138_H0140:350b-5: yon tan dag gis sems can thams cad byang chub rgyur 'gyur rab tu bskul //
K10D0138_H0140:350b-6: khyod kyis chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nyon mongs ri rnams bcom par 'gyur //
K10D0138_H0140:350b-7: tha ma'i spyod pa byang chub shes pa'i rgyu ni de ring mthar phyin to //
K10D0138_H0140:350b-8: sman pa chen po sems can snying po mtshan rnams kyis ni rab brgyan pa //
K10D0138_H0140:350b-9: sems can snying po sangs rgyas 'gyur ba 'dren pa
K10D0138_H0140:350b-10: de ring bshad du gsol; ;bdag gis lta ba'i rgya
K10D0138_H0140:350b-11: mtsho bcad cing grol nas 'gro ba bsgral bar bgyi
K10D0138_H0140:350b-12: // ji srid kyis ni sangs rgyas 'gyur ba mi yi dam pa lung bstan gsol //
K10D0138_H0140:350b-13: sdug bsngal chu bo 'das pa'i sems can srid pa'i mtsho las bsgral bar bgyi //
K10D0138_H0140:350b-14: mya ngan 'das pa'i bde ba zag pa med pa'i lam la dgod par bgyi //
K10D0138_H0140:350b-15: phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas gang rnams yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu dag /
K10D0138_H0140:350b-16: de dag bdag gis dpang du gsol te byang chub tu ni sems gzhol bgyi //
K10D0138_H0140:350b-17: drag cing mi bzad rtsub pa'i sdug bsngal dag gis reg pa'i sems can kun //
K10D0138_H0140:351a-1: gsum gyi ni bdag gi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi bsod nams des //
K10D0138_H0140:351a-2: sems can thams cad sdug bsngal de ring zhi bar gyur cig sems can kun //
K10D0138_H0140:351a-3: sangs rgyas kyi ni bde dang ldan zhing rtag tu mya ngan 'das par shog /
K10D0138_H0140:351a-4: sems can thams cad nang zhir gyur cig nyon mongs chu yang skam par shog /
K10D0138_H0140:351a-5: ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes dbang po'i snying po ldan pa thob gyur cig /
K10D0138_H0140:351a-6: sems can gang dag bsad par chad cing sdug bsngal dag gis gtses pa rnams //
K10D0138_H0140:351a-7: de dag bdag gi bsod nams gzi brjid dag gis myur du thar par shog /
K10D0138_H0140:351a-8: sems can re res kyang ni yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad thob gyur cig /
K10D0138_H0140:351a-9: shes rab bsod nams tshad med pa dang bde ba kun gyis tshim par shog /
K10D0138_H0140:351a-10: de dag sdig pa'i rnam spangs lta ba mnyam nyid myur du bsten gyur cig /
K10D0138_H0140:351a-11: sems can thams cad skye ba dran cing chos la spyod pa nyid du shog /
K10D0138_H0140:351a-12: sems can de kun chos grus srid pa'i rgya mtsho pha rol rgal gyur cig /
K10D0138_H0140:351a-13: thams cad chos kyi pha rol phyin pa sangs rgyas su yang grub par shog /
K10D0138_H0140:351a-14: bskal pa dpag tu med par chos kyi char ba 'bebs shing 'dug gyur cig /
K10D0138_H0140:351a-15: sems can thams cad chos kyi sprin gyi char chus legs par 'khru bar shog /
K10D0138_H0140:351a-16: bdag gi lus dang ngag dang yid kyis nongs ba cung zad ci bgyis pa //
K10D0138_H0140:351b-0: sangs rgyas thams cad dpang du gsol @351b te gus par bgyis nas so sor bshags //
K10D0138_H0140:351b-1: bdag kyang phyin chad sdig la lta ba'i las rnams spyod par ma gyur cig /
K10D0138_H0140:351b-2: rtag tu mdun na bsam gyis mi khyab gang zag mtshog bzhugs mthong bar shog /
K10D0138_H0140:351b-3: bdag gi bsod nams cung zad ci mchis deng de byang chub bsngo bar bgyi //
K10D0138_H0140:351b-4: sems can ched du spyod pa kun dang sdug bsngal thams cad spro bar bgyi //
K10D0138_H0140:351b-5: sems can thams cad byang chub mchog gi lam du rab tu gzung bar bgyi //
K10D0138_H0140:351b-6: bskal bar zhing dang ye shes sems can rgya mtsho rnam par spyad par bgyi //
K10D0138_H0140:351b-7: gang du byang chub reg par 'gyur zhing rnam par dag pa thob par bgyi //
K10D0138_H0140:351b-8: 'khor kun rnam par dag cing bzod pa'i sa la rab tu gnas par shog /
K10D0138_H0140:351b-9: smra ba'i sengge nges par mngon par shes pa lnga rnams thob par shog /
K10D0138_H0140:351b-10: 'dren pa chags med ye shes ldan zhing thams cad gzigs pa lung bstan gsol //
K10D0138_H0140:351b-11: 'jig rten du yang sangs rgyas chos kun kha lo sgyur bar 'gyur zhe na /
K10D0138_H0140:351b-12: me tog sil ma gtor ba nam mkha' la ni gdugs su gnas par shog /
K10D0138_H0140:351b-13: lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin mi rnams lhag pa kun kyang dbang gyis shig /
K10D0138_H0140:351b-14: sa rnams g-yo bar byed cing khyod kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal shog /
K10D0138_H0140:351b-15: de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas me
K10D0138_H0140:351b-16: tog de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de'i
K10D0138_H0140:351b-17: steng logs su gtor ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:352a-1: de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug
K10D0138_H0140:352a-2: gi steng du gdugs gcig tu gyur nas 'dug ste
K10D0138_H0140:352a-3: / drang srong skar ma la dga' bas de mthong
K10D0138_H0140:352a-4: nas rab tu zang zing med cing mchog tu dga'
K10D0138_H0140:352a-5: / ba dang / yid bde bas tshim par byed par gyur te /
K10D0138_H0140:352a-6: de nas pus mo'i lha nga gnyis sa la btsugs
K10D0138_H0140:352a-7: te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs so
K10D0138_H0140:352a-8: // drang srong chen po skar ma la dga' bas
K10D0138_H0140:352a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs ma thag
K10D0138_H0140:352a-10: tu de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum
K10D0138_H0140:352a-11: gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam
K10D0138_H0140:352a-13: sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med
K10D0138_H0140:352a-14: dpag tu med pa gang dag der lhags pa de
K10D0138_H0140:352a-15: dag thams cad kyang yid skyo zhing ltad mor gyur
K10D0138_H0140:352a-16: to // gang dag glang po ches 'dul ba'i sems can de dag gis ni /
K10D0138_H0140:352a-17: bde bar gshegs pa glang po che'i gzugs su mthong
K10D0138_H0140:352a-18: nas yid dga' bar gyur cing drang srong chen pos
K10D0138_H0140:352a-19: me tog gtor ba de dag steng gi bar snang
K10D0138_H0140:352a-20: la gdugs su gyur te gnas pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:352a-21: sa g-yos pa de'ang mthong nas rab tu ngo mtshar
K10D0138_H0140:352a-22: du gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
K10D0138_H0140:352a-23: gtugs so // gang dag yang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis ni /
K10D0138_H0140:352b-0: bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi cha byad @352b du mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur to //
K10D0138_H0140:352b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:352b-2: sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can de dag gis
K10D0138_H0140:352b-3: ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs par mthong nas zang
K10D0138_H0140:352b-4: zing med cing mchog tu dga' ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:352b-5: mgu ba skyes te bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang /
K10D0138_H0140:352b-11: rgyan ji snyed pa dag gis gtor to //
K10D0138_H0140:352b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K10D0138_H0140:352b-13: drang srong chen po myur du longs la nyon; ;byang chub lung bstan zhes ni 'dren pa gsung //
K10D0138_H0140:352b-14: mnyam pa med pa'i mthus ni sa g-yos shing //
K10D0138_H0140:352b-15: nam mkha' la yang me tog gdugs gcig 'dug /
K10D0138_H0140:352b-16: khyod ni 'jig rten phan phyir ston dbang po //
K10D0138_H0140:352b-17: rkang gnyis bdag gi gtso bo sangs rgyas su //
K10D0138_H0140:352b-18: bsod nams mtha' yas nam mkha' tshad mnyam pa //
K10D0138_H0140:352b-19: khams gsum snying po 'gro ba'i sgron mar 'gyur //
K10D0138_H0140:352b-20: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K10D0138_H0140:352b-21: skar ma la dga' bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di
K10D0138_H0140:352b-23: gang du bdag chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur
K10D0138_H0140:352b-24: ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ci 'dra bar 'gyur
K10D0138_H0140:352b-25: / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0138_H0140:353a-0: khyod ni bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med pa na byang phyogs su sangs @353a *//
K10D0138_H0140:353a-1: rgyas kyi zhing me tog rgyas pa'i dri zhes bya ba 'byung ste /
K10D0138_H0140:353a-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni /
K10D0138_H0140:353a-3: ji ltar da ltar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams bde
K10D0138_H0140:353a-4: ba can bzhin du bkod pa de lta bu dang
K10D0138_H0140:353a-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes bu dam pa khyod
K10D0138_H0140:353a-7: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
K10D0138_H0140:353a-8: chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste /
K10D0138_H0140:353a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
K10D0138_H0140:353a-10: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan
K10D0138_H0140:353a-13: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10D0138_H0140:353a-14: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10D0138_H0140:353a-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdul med spos snang skar ma'i dpal zhes bya bar 'gyur te /
K10D0138_H0140:353a-17: bar gyi bskal pa bcu thub par 'gyur ro //
K10D0138_H0140:353a-18: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas med cing /
K10D0138_H0140:353a-19: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ba' zhig gi gnas su 'gyur te /
K10D0138_H0140:353a-20: khyod kyang de na theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig ston par 'gyur ro //
K10D0138_H0140:353a-21: 'khor ji snyed lhags pa rnams kyis byang chub sems
K10D0138_H0140:353a-22: dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' ba'i
K10D0138_H0140:353a-23: lung bstan pa de thos nas bcom ldan 'das la
K10D0138_H0140:353a-24: mchod pa bya ba'i las la mngon par brtson par
K10D0138_H0140:353a-25: gyur to // bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag dang /
K10D0138_H0140:353b-0: srog chags @353b bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
K10D0138_H0140:353b-1: dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyis bla na med pa yang
K10D0138_H0140:353b-2: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par
K10D0138_H0140:353b-3: gyur te / de dag thams cad kyis byang chub
K10D0138_H0140:353b-4: sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyi sems mi
K10D0138_H0140:353b-5: brjed pa zhes bya ba thob bo //
K10D0138_H0140:353b-6: 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las /
K10D0138_H0140:353b-7: drang srong skar ma la dga' ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o ////
K10D0138_H0140:353b-9: de nas bdud bye ba dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K10D0138_H0140:353b-10: ji ltar grong khyer 'di'i phyi rol lha dang /
K10D0138_H0140:353b-12: gnod sbyin dag gis brgyan pa de bzhin du bdag
K10D0138_H0140:353b-13: cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das grong khyer 'di'i sgo
K10D0138_H0140:353b-14: gang dang / gang nas gshegs pa de'i sgo de dang /
K10D0138_H0140:353b-15: de'i sa phyogs bkod pa'i rgyan dam pa khyad par du 'phags pas brgyan to snyam pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:353b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis bdud bye
K10D0138_H0140:353b-17: ba de dag gi sems kyi kun tu rtog pa
K10D0138_H0140:353b-18: mkhyen nas 'di 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du
K10D0138_H0140:353b-19: bya ba mngon par mdzad de /
K10D0138_H0140:353b-20: 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba
K10D0138_H0140:353b-21: mngon par mdzad pas grong khyer gyi sgo bcu gnyis
K10D0138_H0140:353b-22: su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bcu gnyis grong khyer
K10D0138_H0140:353b-23: gyi sgo re re nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong
K10D0138_H0140:353b-25: bdud bye ba de dag kyang nam mkha' la gnas
K10D0138_H0140:353b-26: bzhin du bdud kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i
K10D0138_H0140:353b-27: rgyan shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul
K10D0138_H0140:354a-1: dang ldan pa bkod pa'i mchog rnams dang /
K10D0138_H0140:354a-2: bkod pa mdzes pa rnams kyi grong khyer gyi sgo de dag dang /
K10D0138_H0140:354a-6: sa'i ngos de dag brgyan to //
K10D0138_H0140:354a-7: bdud bye ba de dag dang /
K10D0138_H0140:354a-8: bdud kyi 'khor de dag la la ni /
K10D0138_H0140:354a-9: tshangs pa'i cha byad lta bu nas drang srong chen
K10D0138_H0140:354a-10: po'i cha byad lta bu'i bar du bsgyur te nam
K10D0138_H0140:354a-11: mkha' la gnas bzhin du khang pa brtsegs pa de
K10D0138_H0140:354a-15: skyed shing gi nang du me tog dang /
K10D0138_H0140:354a-22: mu tig sna tshogs kyis spras pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:354a-25: ras bcos bu sna tshogs dang /
K10D0138_H0140:354a-26: lhab lhub kyi rgyan rnams kyi char ni /
K10D0138_H0140:354a-31: yon tan bsngags pa sna tshogs kyi dbyangs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do //
K10D0138_H0140:354a-32: bcom ldan 'das de ltar ngo mtshar rmad du byung
K10D0138_H0140:354a-33: ba chen po sngon ma thos pa'i bkod pa mchog
K10D0138_H0140:354a-35: khyad par du 'phags pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong
K10D0138_H0140:354a-36: khyer chen po'i sgo nas zhugs te zhabs g-yas pa'i
K10D0138_H0140:354a-37: mthe bo'i sgo'i them pa la reg par mdzad do
K10D0138_H0140:354a-38: // bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo'i them pa la reg
K10D0138_H0140:354a-39: ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la thams cad
K10D0138_H0140:354b-0: dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong @354b chen po'i
K10D0138_H0140:354b-1: 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu g-yos so //
K10D0138_H0140:354b-2: gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i brgya byin dang /
K10D0138_H0140:354b-15: lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dag dang /
K10D0138_H0140:354b-25: lha'i drang srong chen po'i 'khor dang /
K10D0138_H0140:354b-26: 'og min gyi bar nas bzung ste sems can gzi
K10D0138_H0140:354b-27: brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba de dag thams
K10D0138_H0140:354b-28: cad sa g-yos par snang ba des bskul ma thag
K10D0138_H0140:354b-29: tu rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po khor
K10D0138_H0140:354b-30: khor yug tu bsgor nas sa dang nam mkha' la
K10D0138_H0140:354b-33: dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i phye ma'i bar gyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor to //
K10D0138_H0140:354b-34: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis me tog dang /
K10D0138_H0140:354b-35: phye ma'i bar de dag phyogs bcu'i phyogs kyi cha
K10D0138_H0140:354b-36: re re na'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab
K10D0138_H0140:354b-37: kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
K10D0138_H0140:354b-38: dag pa dang / yongs su ma dag pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:354b-40: mi stong pa rnams su sangs rgyas la mchod cing
K10D0138_H0140:354b-41: bsti stang bya ba'i phyir nam mkha' la gtor ba
K10D0138_H0140:354b-42: dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu me tog dang /
K10D0138_H0140:355a-1: de dag las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo //
K10D0138_H0140:355a-2: myur du sad par gyis la 'di dag ltos //
K10D0138_H0140:355a-3: byang chub phyir ni bag yod spyad pa spyod //
K10D0138_H0140:355a-4: khyod kyi 'khor ba'i gcong rong 'khyams pa yi //
K10D0138_H0140:355a-5: 'jig rten thams cad dag ni bsgral bar byos //
K10D0138_H0140:355a-6: yongs su smin dang ldan pa'i dus bab kyi //
K10D0138_H0140:355a-7: g-yeng bar gyur pa rab tu myur thong la //
K10D0138_H0140:355a-8: 'dir ni sngon gyi dam bcas yid la byos //
K10D0138_H0140:355a-9: byang chub lung bstan rab tu thob par 'gyur //
K10D0138_H0140:355a-10: thub dbang drang srong chen po mya ngan med //
K10D0138_H0140:355a-11: 'gro la phan phyir de ring grong khyer gshegs //
K10D0138_H0140:355a-12: bdud stong bye ba rang gis pham mdzad de //
K10D0138_H0140:355a-13: de ni chos kyi 'khor lo myur du bskor //
