K10D0138_H0140:390a-15: po shin tu rnam par phye ba'i blo gros zhes
K10D0138_H0140:390a-16: bya ba zhig / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
K10D0138_H0140:390a-17: pa sh'akya thub pa dang ha cang yang mi ring
K10D0138_H0140:390a-18: bya ba zhig / ba zhig na / bcom ldan
K10D0138_H0140:390a-19: 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu 'od 'bar ba
K10D0138_H0140:390a-20: dpal gyi spyan sngar 'dug nas de yud tsam gyis
K10D0138_H0140:390a-22: skad cig gis bdud kyi gzugs su snang ngo //
K10D0138_H0140:390a-25: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i dbang po'i gzugs dang /
K10D0138_H0140:390b-13: ma he nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi bar gyi gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs su snang ngo //
K10D0138_H0140:390b-24: sman rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K10D0138_H0140:390b-26: yud tsam gyis dge slong dang /
K10D0138_H0140:390b-28: skad cig gis sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su snang ngo //
K10D0138_H0140:390b-29: skad cig gis kha dog dang /
K10D0138_H0140:390b-32: gzugs brgyad cu rtsa bzhir snang ngo //
K10D0138_H0140:390b-33: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de
K10D0138_H0140:390b-34: la tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos
K10D0138_H0140:390b-36: rigs kyi bu 'di kha dog dang /
K10D0138_H0140:390b-39: gzugs brgyad cu rtsa bzhir gda' ba'i rgyu gang lags /
K10D0138_H0140:390b-41: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0138_H0140:390b-42: tshe dang ldan pa gang po /
K10D0138_H0140:390b-43: rigs kyi bu 'di rab tu mthu che ste /
K10D0138_H0140:390b-44: byang chub sems dpa' shin tu rnam par phye ba'i
K10D0138_H0140:390b-45: blo gros dam bcas pa'i stobs kyi yul gang la
K10D0138_H0140:390b-46: gnas nas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed
K10D0138_H0140:390b-47: cing / shes rab kyi mig sgrib pa med pas
K10D0138_H0140:390b-48: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa
K10D0138_H0140:391a-1: su ma dag pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na bsam pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:391a-2: sems pa ji lta bu dang /
K10D0138_H0140:391a-3: spyod pa ji lta bu dang /
K10D0138_H0140:391a-4: ci 'dra ba'i nad kyis btab pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:391a-5: gang la gang skyabs su song ba'i sems can ji
K10D0138_H0140:391a-6: 'dra ba dag mthong ba de 'dra ba'i ting nge
K10D0138_H0140:391a-7: 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'dul ba ji lta
K10D0138_H0140:391a-8: ba bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi
K10D0138_H0140:391a-14: gzugs de lta bu dag gis sems can rnams theg
K10D0138_H0140:391a-15: pa gsum las phyir mi ldog pa la 'god pa
K10D0138_H0140:391a-16: dang / sems can gang dag 'dod pa'i zil gyis non te ye byad dang /
K10D0138_H0140:391a-17: longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'dod pa de
K10D0138_H0140:391a-18: dag gi chags pa spangs pa'i phyir yo byad rnams
K10D0138_H0140:391a-19: byin nas phyir mi ldog pa la 'god pa dang
K10D0138_H0140:391a-20: / nad kyis btab nas sman 'dod pa rnams la
K10D0138_H0140:391a-21: sman byin te phyir mi ldog pa la 'god pa
K10D0138_H0140:391a-22: / dang / byang chub sems dpa' shin tu rnam
K10D0138_H0140:391a-23: par phye ba'i blo gros 'dis nyin gcig la gangg'a'i
K10D0138_H0140:391a-24: klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams sdug
K10D0138_H0140:391a-25: bsngal las yongs su thar par byas te theg pa
K10D0138_H0140:391a-26: gsum las phyir mi ldog par 'god pa'i dam bcas
K10D0138_H0140:391a-29: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa ma yin /
K10D0138_H0140:391a-33: rigs kyi bu 'dis sems can yongs su smin par
K10D0138_H0140:391b-0: bgyi ba'i slad du skyes bu chen po'i mthu @391b
K10D0138_H0140:391b-1: chen po brtsams nas ji srid cig lags /
K10D0138_H0140:391b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0138_H0140:391b-3: rigs kyi bu 'dis bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye
K10D0138_H0140:391b-4: ma snyed kyi pha rol tu bla na med pa
K10D0138_H0140:391b-5: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
K10D0138_H0140:391b-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed do //
K10D0138_H0140:391b-9: byang chub sems dpa' shin tu rnam par phye ba'i
K10D0138_H0140:391b-10: blo gros 'dis bskal pa gang dag la ting nge
K10D0138_H0140:391b-11: 'dzin gyi mthus skyes bu'i mthu 'di lta bu brtsams
K10D0138_H0140:391b-12: nas bskal pa grangs med pa drug cu rtsa bzhi
K10D0138_H0140:391b-14: 'di ji srid cig na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang
K10D0138_H0140:391b-15: du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
K10D0138_H0140:391b-16: byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
K10D0138_H0140:391b-17: 'gyur / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0138_H0140:391b-18: bskal pa chen po brgya stong phrag nyi shu rtsa
K10D0138_H0140:391b-19: drug 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa chen po sgrol
K10D0138_H0140:391b-20: ba zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas kyi zhing nor
K10D0138_H0140:391b-21: bu'i snying po zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te
K10D0138_H0140:391b-22: / skye rgu'i tshe lo stong phrag bzhi bcu thub
K10D0138_H0140:391b-23: pa na mtshams med pa byed pa nas mi dge
K10D0138_H0140:391b-24: ba bcu'i chos kyi bar dang ldan pa'i sems can
K10D0138_H0140:391b-25: rnams kyi nang du bla na med pa yang dag
K10D0138_H0140:391b-26: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
K10D0138_H0140:391b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
K10D0138_H0140:391b-29: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog rgyas pa mtha' yas
K10D0138_H0140:391b-30: pa'i 'od zer zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0138_H0140:391b-31: des lo bzhi khrir sangs rgyas kyi bya ba ma lus par byed par 'gyur ro //
K10D0138_H0140:392a-1: su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir theg pa gsum
K10D0138_H0140:392a-2: po dag las sems can rnams yongs su smin par
K10D0138_H0140:392a-4: de'i 'og tu phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya
K10D0138_H0140:392a-5: ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'da'
K10D0138_H0140:392a-6: bar 'gyur ro // gang pos gsol pa /
K10D0138_H0140:392a-8: skyes bu dam pa 'dis sngon sems can gang dag
K10D0138_H0140:392a-9: yongs su smin par bgyis pa de dag gang du
K10D0138_H0140:392a-10: 'byung bar 'gyur / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0138_H0140:392a-11: skyes bu chen po de'i smon lam ris su cha pa med de /
K10D0138_H0140:392a-12: des smon lam 'di skad du nam phyogs bcu'i phyogs
K10D0138_H0140:392a-13: re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra
K10D0138_H0140:392a-14: rab rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su
K10D0138_H0140:392a-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bar chad med
K10D0138_H0140:392a-16: par mthong bar ma gyur tam /
K10D0138_H0140:392a-17: bdag gis sngon byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa
K10D0138_H0140:392a-18: na sems can gang dag thog mar bla na med
K10D0138_H0140:392a-19: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la btsud
K10D0138_H0140:392a-20: pa dang / yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa
K10D0138_H0140:392a-21: dang; pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod pa
K10D0138_H0140:392a-22: de dag phyogs bcur so sor sangs rgyas kyi zhing
K10D0138_H0140:392a-23: du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
K10D0138_H0140:392a-24: byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma
K10D0138_H0140:392a-25: mthong ba de srid du bdag bla na med pa
K10D0138_H0140:392a-26: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
K10D0138_H0140:392a-28: ting nge 'dzin bkod pa'i mthu 'di 'dra bas phyogs
K10D0138_H0140:392b-0: bcu'i phyogs @392b re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing
K10D0138_H0140:392b-1: gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas
K10D0138_H0140:392b-2: kyi zhing rnams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag
K10D0138_H0140:392b-3: dang / gzhan dag na'ang sems can gang dag mtshams med pa byed pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:392b-4: the tshom can nas mi dge ba'i chos kyi bar
K10D0138_H0140:392b-5: dang ldan par gyur pa de rnams de dag nas
K10D0138_H0140:392b-6: shi 'phos nas bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du
K10D0138_H0140:392b-7: skyes la / bdag byang chub sems dpar 'gyur bzhin
K10D0138_H0140:392b-8: du de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba
K10D0138_H0140:392b-10: phyir mi ldog pa la sos sor bkod nas de
K10D0138_H0140:392b-11: nas gdod bdag bla na med pa yang dag par
K10D0138_H0140:392b-12: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
K10D0138_H0140:392b-13: rgya bar skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu
K10D0138_H0140:392b-14: rgyun du bya'o // zhes smon lam btab bo //
K10D0138_H0140:392b-15: de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas 'dus
K10D0138_H0140:392b-16: pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'di skad ces
K10D0138_H0140:392b-17: gsol to // gang dag da ltar sangs rgyas kyi
K10D0138_H0140:392b-18: zhing 'dir lhags pa rnams ston pa 'di lta bu
K10D0138_H0140:392b-20: byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po dang ldan
K10D0138_H0140:392b-21: pa 'dus pa chen po 'di lta bu'ang mthong 'das
K10D0138_H0140:392b-22: pa dang / ma byon pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:392b-23: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
K10D0138_H0140:392b-24: kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten
K10D0138_H0140:392b-25: pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bgyi
K10D0138_H0140:392b-27: tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan
K10D0138_H0140:392b-28: pa'i chos kyi tshul gyi byin gyi rlabs sngon ma
K10D0138_H0140:392b-29: thos pa 'di'ang mnyan pa'i slad du rnyed pa ni
K10D0138_H0140:392b-30: / bdag cag gis legs par rnyed do //
K10D0138_H0140:393a-1: pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las /
K10D0138_H0140:393a-2: dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o ////
K10D0138_H0140:393a-3: yang de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas
K10D0138_H0140:393a-4: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la bos te 'di
K10D0138_H0140:393a-17: lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po nas mi dang /
K10D0138_H0140:393a-18: mi ma yin pa'i bar du gang dag sangs rgyas
K10D0138_H0140:393a-19: kyi bstan pa la dang pa 'dir lhags pa khyed
K10D0138_H0140:393a-20: cag thams cad ngas spro bar bya'o //
K10D0138_H0140:393a-21: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dus pa 'di lta bu 'di dang /
K10D0138_H0140:393a-22: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'dus pa 'di dang /
K10D0138_H0140:393a-31: mi ma yin pa 'dus pa 'di lta bu ni /
K10D0138_H0140:393a-34: da khyod kyis 'di mthong nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
K10D0138_H0140:393a-35: 'dir ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dam pa'i chos 'di
K10D0138_H0140:393a-36: dang / chos kyi tshul 'di yongs su bskyang ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:393a-37: dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs 'di 'bar bar byed par
K10D0138_H0140:393a-38: spro ba dag gis da de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
K10D0138_H0140:393a-39: kyi spyan sngar khyed so so nas rang rang gi
K10D0138_H0140:393a-41: yang de'i tshe bdud dge sbyong me tog ces bya bas me tog dang /
K10D0138_H0140:393b-0: myu @393b gu sna tshogs kyis rin po che sna
K10D0138_H0140:393b-1: bdun gyi bra bo byur bur bkang ste bud med
K10D0138_H0140:393b-2: kyi gzugs kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang
K10D0138_H0140:393b-3: ldan par bsgyur nas bud med kyi gos dang /
K10D0138_H0140:393b-4: rgyan mchog gis brgyan te 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0138_H0140:393b-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang su dag sangs rgyas
K10D0138_H0140:393b-6: kyi zhing 'dir byon te bzhugs pa thams cad dang
K10D0138_H0140:393b-7: / gang gzhan yang su dag 'dir 'dus pa thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol /
K10D0138_H0140:393b-8: bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la me tog dang /
K10D0138_H0140:393b-11: myu gu thams cad kyis byur bur yongs su gtams shing rgyas pa'i bre bo 'di 'bul na /
K10D0138_H0140:393b-12: sems can thams cad la thugs brtse bar dgongs te
K10D0138_H0140:393b-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis bdag gi
K10D0138_H0140:393b-17: myu gu thams cad kyis yongs su gtams pa 'di bzhes su gsol /
K10D0138_H0140:393b-18: 'di ltar bdag bskal pa bzang po mtha' dag la
K10D0138_H0140:393b-19: sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'dir bud med
K10D0138_H0140:393b-20: kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams la zas dang /
K10D0138_H0140:393b-23: me tog sbyin pa'i bdag por 'gyur bar bgyi /
K10D0138_H0140:393b-24: de dag kyang yongs su smin par bgyi /
K10D0138_H0140:393b-25: bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa des bdag pha
K10D0138_H0140:393b-26: rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs nas bla
K10D0138_H0140:393b-27: na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
K10D0138_H0140:393b-28: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi /
K10D0138_H0140:394a-0: sems can gang dag bdag gis 'dul ba de dag kyang yo byad @394a *//
K10D0138_H0140:394a-1: kyis mi brel bar bdag gis rim gro bgyi na /
K10D0138_H0140:394a-2: bdag gi bsam pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par dngos grub stsal du gsol /
K10D0138_H0140:394a-3: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0138_H0140:394a-4: skyes bu dam pa khyod 'di ltar sems mngon par
K10D0138_H0140:394a-5: dad pas sbyin pa che zhing mtho ba byas pa
K10D0138_H0140:394a-6: dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la khyod kyis mchod pa byas pa legs so //
K10D0138_H0140:394a-8: khyod kyi bre bo me tog dang /
K10D0138_H0140:394a-9: 'bras bus yongs su gang ba 'di'ang bzhes so //
K10D0138_H0140:394a-13: lo tog la sogs pa ji ltar 'dod pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:394a-14: gang gi phyir 'dod pa rnyed par gyur cig /
K10D0138_H0140:394a-15: khyod kyi re ba yid kyi brnag pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
K10D0138_H0140:394a-18: 'bru phun sum tshogs pa grub par gyur cig /
K10D0138_H0140:394a-19: 'byor pa'ang phun sum tshogs par gyur cig /
K10D0138_H0140:394a-20: de nas bdud dge sbyong me tog gis yang gsol pa /
K10D0138_H0140:394a-25: ri brag gang dag na bdud kyi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i gzungs 'di 'chang ngam /
K10D0138_H0140:394a-28: glegs bam la bris te bsti stang bgyi ba'i grong dang /
K10D0138_H0140:394a-32: ri brag de dag tu bdag gnas par bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:394a-33: de dang de dag tu shing ljon pa rnams kyi me tog dang /
K10D0138_H0140:394a-35: lo tog gi bar du bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:394b-0: de dag thams cad @394b na me tog dang /
K10D0138_H0140:394b-1: 'bras bu 'tshal ba'i sems can rnams kyang tshim par bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:394b-4: tshe bas pa ma gtogs par gal te de na sems can me tog dang /
K10D0138_H0140:394b-5: 'bras bu'i zas 'tshal ba 'ga' zhig me tog dang /
K10D0138_H0140:394b-6: 'bras bu'i zas ma 'tshal ba'i slad du 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par gyur na /
K10D0138_H0140:394b-7: dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang /
K10D0138_H0140:394b-8: 'dus pa chen po ma lus pa 'di bdag gis bslus par gyur gyi /
K10D0138_H0140:394b-9: bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
K10D0138_H0140:394b-10: pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
K10D0138_H0140:394b-11: ma gyur cig / gang yang de na sems can rnams me tog dang /
K10D0138_H0140:394b-13: bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
K10D0138_H0140:394b-16: 'bras bu de dag 'tshal nas gang sems can de dag gcig la gcig phan pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:394b-18: snying rje'i sems su 'gyur ba de ni /
K10D0138_H0140:394b-19: bdag gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:394b-20: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
K10D0138_H0140:394b-22: 'bras bu 'tshal nas brtson 'grus dang ldan par 'gyur ba de ni /
K10D0138_H0140:394b-23: bdag gi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
K10D0138_H0140:394b-24: gang sems dang sems las byung ba dag la mi rtag pa'i 'du shes 'jug pa de ni /
K10D0138_H0140:394b-25: bdag gi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
K10D0138_H0140:395a-2: 'bras bu 'tshal nas tha na bya dang /
K10D0138_H0140:395a-3: ri dvags kyang chos 'tshal bar gyur cing stong pa nyid la gnas na /
K10D0138_H0140:395a-5: bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
K10D0138_H0140:395a-6: gzhan yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang du byung ba der sems can rnams kyi 'bras dang /
K10D0138_H0140:395a-15: gang dag lo tog tu gyur pa de dag 'tshal ba'i slad du bdag gis nan tan cher bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:395a-17: lo tog mang po dag gis kyang mdzod dang /
K10D0138_H0140:395a-18: bang ba thams cad yongs su gtams par bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:395a-19: de na sems can gang tha na bya dang /
K10D0138_H0140:395a-20: ri dvags dag gis kyang 'tshal bar gyur na /
K10D0138_H0140:395a-22: bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
K10D0138_H0140:395a-23: der bdag gi bu ram shing dang /

K10D0138_H0140:405a-8: thub pas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog mandr'a ra
K10D0138_H0140:405a-9: ba'i dri mos la 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K10D0138_H0140:405a-10: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa thob la rnams sam /
K10D0138_H0140:405a-23: chos kyi tshul 'di la mngon par brtson pa rnams dang /
K10D0138_H0140:405a-24: gang dag dbus kyi gling bzhi po 'di dag na gnas pa /
K10D0138_H0140:405a-25: chos kyi tshul 'di la mngon par dad pa'i brgya byin dang /
K10D0138_H0140:405a-27: 'jig rten skyong ba gnas lto 'phye chen po'i dbang
K10D0138_H0140:405a-28: po'i bar de dag gi lag tu gzungs kyi phyag
K10D0138_H0140:405a-29: rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su gtad par
K10D0138_H0140:405a-30: mdzod cig / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me
K10D0138_H0140:405a-31: tog mand'a ra ba'i dri mos kyis dbyangs kyi dkyil
K10D0138_H0140:405a-32: 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa thogs pa med pas sangs
K10D0138_H0140:405b-0: rgyas kyi zhing mtha' @405b dag khyab par mdzad nas
K10D0138_H0140:405b-3: gang su dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'dus pa thams cad nyon cig /
K10D0138_H0140:405b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
K10D0138_H0140:405b-5: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba
K10D0138_H0140:405b-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad gcig tu sangs
K10D0138_H0140:405b-8: rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu 'dus pa 'di shin tu
K10D0138_H0140:405b-9: dkon te / khyod la thugs brtse ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:405b-10: sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:405b-11: dam pa'i chos kyi tshul byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:405b-12: bla na med pa'i lam la dgod pa'i phyir sangs
K10D0138_H0140:405b-13: rgyas 'di dag thams cad 'dus te dam pa'i chos
K10D0138_H0140:405b-14: kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang
K10D0138_H0140:405b-15: / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:405b-16: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba
K10D0138_H0140:405b-17: nas 'khor ba'i pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i
K10D0138_H0140:405b-18: bar gyi phyir da ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
K10D0138_H0140:405b-19: thams cad kyis dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sa'i khams
K10D0138_H0140:405b-20: thams cad byin gyis brlabs so; ;chu'i khams thams cad
K10D0138_H0140:405b-21: dang / me'i khams thams cad dang /
K10D0138_H0140:405b-22: rlung gi khams thams cad dang /
K10D0138_H0140:405b-23: nam mkha'i khams thams cad byin gyis brlabs so //
K10D0138_H0140:405b-24: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams
K10D0138_H0140:405b-25: cad kyis gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na
K10D0138_H0140:405b-26: gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K10D0138_H0140:406a-9: lto phye chen po'i dbang po dag dang /
K10D0138_H0140:406a-10: gang dag gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba'i sems can rnams dang /
K10D0138_H0140:406a-11: gang dag yang gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
K10D0138_H0140:406a-12: na gnas pa de dag thams cad la bos te
K10D0138_H0140:406a-15: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i
K10D0138_H0140:406a-16: phyir chos kyi tshul 'di byin gyis brlabs te khyod
K10D0138_H0140:406a-17: kyi lag tu shin tu gtad kyi /
K10D0138_H0140:406a-18: ci nas 'dir dam pa'i chos 'di myur du mi 'jig pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:406a-19: nub par mi 'gyur ba de ltar khyed kyis dam pa'i chos 'di yid la gyis shig /
K10D0138_H0140:406a-21: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang
K10D0138_H0140:406a-22: dag 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
K10D0138_H0140:406a-23: 'dzin pa nas yi ger bris te 'chang ba'i bar
K10D0138_H0140:406a-29: dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag de dag thams
K10D0138_H0140:406a-30: cad yongs su bsrung zhing bskyang ba'i phyir rigs kyi
K10D0138_H0140:406a-31: bu khyod kyi lag tu gtad kyi /
K10D0138_H0140:406a-34: bsam gtan la mngon par dga' ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:406a-36: dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams khyed kyis
K10D0138_H0140:406a-37: bsrung par bya ba nas yongs su bskyang ba'i bar
K10D0138_H0140:406b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
K10D0138_H0140:406b-3: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag byung bar gyur pa'i
K10D0138_H0140:406b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang nyon
K10D0138_H0140:406b-5: mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs
K10D0138_H0140:406b-6: rgyas kyi zhing du 'dus nas chos kyi tshul 'di
K10D0138_H0140:406b-7: bsrung ba dang / mi nub par bya ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:406b-8: dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag kun tu bsrung
K10D0138_H0140:406b-9: ba nas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par
K10D0138_H0140:406b-10: bya ba'i bar gyi phyir brgya byin dang /
K10D0138_H0140:406b-12: 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyi lag tu gtad do //
K10D0138_H0140:406b-13: de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na phyogs bcur
K10D0138_H0140:406b-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba de dag thams
K10D0138_H0140:406b-15: cad kyang nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang
K10D0138_H0140:406b-16: ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skad cig gis
K10D0138_H0140:406b-17: 'dus te sems can la phan pa'i phyir gzungs kyi
K10D0138_H0140:406b-18: gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang 'chad par gyur
K10D0138_H0140:406b-19: / chos kyi tshul 'di'ang byin gyis brlab par 'gyur zhing /
K10D0138_H0140:406b-20: chos kyi tshul 'di bsrung ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:406b-21: yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir brgya byin dang /
K10D0138_H0140:406b-23: 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyi lag tu gtad par 'gyur ro //
K10D0138_H0140:406b-24: de bzhin du ded kyis kyang da ltar kun tu bsrung ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:406b-25: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa rnams dang /
K10D0138_H0140:406b-26: gling bzhi pa 'di na gnas pa'i brgya byin dang /
K10D0138_H0140:407a-2: lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rnams kyi lag tu 'di shin tu gtad kyi /
K10D0138_H0140:407a-3: ci nas myur du mi 'jig cing nub par mi
K10D0138_H0140:407a-4: 'gyur ba de ltar khyed kyis dam pa'i chos kyi
K10D0138_H0140:407a-8: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang dag dang /
K10D0138_H0140:407a-9: dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag dge slong dang /
K10D0138_H0140:407a-12: dge bsnyen ma rnams gang 'dus pa chen po'i chos
K10D0138_H0140:407a-13: kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas glegs bam la
K10D0138_H0140:407a-14: bris te 'chang bar byed pa'i bar dang /
K10D0138_H0140:407a-17: bsam gtan la mngon par brtson pa rnams dang /
K10D0138_H0140:407a-18: dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa de dag la khyed kyis bsrung bar bya'o //
K10D0138_H0140:407a-22: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
K10D0138_H0140:407a-28: dgon pa'i gnas nas dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar du
K10D0138_H0140:407a-29: gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod
K10D0138_H0140:407a-32: tha na glegs bam la bris te 'chang na /
K10D0138_H0140:407a-33: chos kyi bcud des sa'i bcud dang /
K10D0138_H0140:407a-34: sems can gyi mdangs 'phel bar 'gyur te /
K10D0138_H0140:407a-35: khyed des mdangs dang ldan zhing /
K10D0138_H0140:407b-3: pha rol gnon pa dang ldan par 'gyur //
K10D0138_H0140:407b-6: mi'i rgyal po rnams kyang srung bar 'gyur te /
K10D0138_H0140:407b-7: de dag gis rgyal srid dang /
K10D0138_H0140:407b-9: de dag gi yul 'khor thams cad kyang srung bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0138_H0140:407b-10: dzambu'i gling gi rgyal po rnams kyang mngon par chos
K10D0138_H0140:407b-11: kyi bcud des tshim nas gcig la gcig phan pa'i
K10D0138_H0140:407b-13: rgyal po de dag las kyi rnam par smin pa la'ang mngon par yid ches par 'gyur /
K10D0138_H0140:407b-15: ser sna med pa'i sems dang /
K10D0138_H0140:407b-16: phan pa'i dngos po'i sems dang /
K10D0138_H0140:407b-17: sems can thams cad la snying rje ba'i sems nas yang dag pa'i lta ba'i bar du 'gyur ro //
K10D0138_H0140:407b-18: so so bdag gi yul la'ang mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0138_H0140:407b-19: dzambu'i gling 'di'ang skye bo rigs pas gang bar 'gyur /
K10D0138_H0140:407b-20: shin tu lo legs pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:407b-22: mi'i skye bo mang pos gang zhing sa'ang mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur /
K10D0138_H0140:407b-23: 'bras bu shin tu mdog bzang ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:407b-30: bde ba la reg par gnas pa bskyed par 'gyur ro //
K10D0138_H0140:407b-35: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /
K10D0138_H0140:408a-3: srin po ma rungs pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:408a-7: dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /
K10D0138_H0140:408a-8: char rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur /
K10D0138_H0140:408a-15: dus rnams kyang legs par 'byung bar 'gyur /
K10D0138_H0140:408a-16: sems can rnams kyang phal cher dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la spyod par 'gyur /
K10D0138_H0140:408a-17: 'di nas shin 'phos nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris
K10D0138_H0140:408a-18: kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skye
K10D0138_H0140:408a-19: bar 'gyur te / de dag kyang khyed kyi g-yog tu 'gyur ro //
K10D0138_H0140:408a-20: de ltar gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i yon tan mang zhing phan yon che ste /
K10D0138_H0140:408a-21: sems can rnams 'khor ba'i pha rol tu 'gro bar
K10D0138_H0140:408a-22: bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'dus pa
K10D0138_H0140:408a-23: chen pos byin gyis brlabs te /
K10D0138_H0140:408a-24: grags pa 'phel zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur /
K10D0138_H0140:408a-25: bud med kyi dngos po skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:408a-26: lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba ma lus par yongs su zad par 'gyur ro //
K10D0138_H0140:408a-27: mdor na tshe 'di la bud med kyi dngos po
K10D0138_H0140:408a-28: myong bar 'gyur bar 'phangs pa thams cad byang bar
K10D0138_H0140:408a-29: 'gyur te / mtshams med pa byed pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:408a-30: dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:408a-31: 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa ma gtogs par gang gzhan lus dang /
K10D0138_H0140:408b-0: yid kyi @408b 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'i gnas
K10D0138_H0140:408b-1: ngan len de thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur
K10D0138_H0140:408b-2: ro // gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di tha na
K10D0138_H0140:408b-3: glegs bam la bris te 'chang na'ang 'dus pa chen
K10D0138_H0140:408b-4: po sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i
K10D0138_H0140:408b-5: gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthus de'i las
K10D0138_H0140:408b-6: ro // dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa ri rab tsam yang byang bar 'gyur /
K10D0138_H0140:408b-7: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la dmigs pa 'phel zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur /
K10D0138_H0140:408b-8: yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:408b-9: bsam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:408b-12: yid kyi legs par spyod pa thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur /
K10D0138_H0140:408b-13: lta ba ngan pa thams cad spong ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:408b-14: dgra thams cad chos dang mthun par tshar gcod pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:408b-15: zhi zhing phra ba'i las thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K10D0138_H0140:408b-16: yul gang du gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
K10D0138_H0140:408b-17: spyod par 'gyur ba der sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
K10D0138_H0140:408b-18: byin gyis brlabs pa 'dus pa chen po'i gzungs kyi
K10D0138_H0140:408b-19: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthus sa phyogs de shin
K10D0138_H0140:408b-21: 'bras bu mdangs dang ldan pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:408b-35: bya skyogs rnams rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur /
K10D0138_H0140:409a-5: yo byad rnams shin tu mchog tu 'gyur te /
K10D0138_H0140:409a-6: de na sems can gang dag zas dang /
K10D0138_H0140:409a-7: skom gyis 'tsho ba de dag ni /
K10D0138_H0140:409a-8: shin tu nad med pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:409a-13: dran pa dang ldan pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:409a-15: dge ba tshol ba la mngon par brtson pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:409a-16: sdig pa'i lta ba yongs su spong bar 'gyur te /
K10D0138_H0140:409a-17: de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas khyed dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur te /
K10D0138_H0140:409a-18: de dag khyed g-yog 'phel nas stobs dang ldan zhing thogs pa med pa'i tshogs su 'gyur gyi /
K10D0138_H0140:409a-19: chos kyi stobs kyis rigs bzhi'i skye bo'i tshogs yongs su bskyang bar gyis shig /
K10D0138_H0140:409a-20: sems can rnams chos kyi don la tshud cig /
K10D0138_H0140:409a-21: de ltar na khyod kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i
K10D0138_H0140:409a-22: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la mchod pa
K10D0138_H0140:409a-24: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog mand'a ra
K10D0138_H0140:409a-25: ba'i dri mos kyis 'dus pa chen po'i mdo'i chos
K10D0138_H0140:409a-28: bsrung ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi ye shes kyi sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pas don dang /
K10D0138_H0140:409a-29: tshig brjod pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma
K10D0138_H0140:409a-30: lus pa 'di kun bkang nas byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0138_H0140:409a-31: sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
K10D0138_H0140:409b-0: brgya byin gyi dbang po @409b nas tshangs pa'i dbang po dang /
K10D0138_H0140:409b-1: lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi bar du gang
K10D0138_H0140:409b-2: dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa phal
K10D0138_H0140:409b-3: cher gling bzhi pa 'di na gnas pa rnams la
K10D0138_H0140:409b-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas spro ba mdzad
K10D0138_H0140:409b-5: do // yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems
K10D0138_H0140:409b-6: dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa gang dag
K10D0138_H0140:409b-7: bzod pa thob pa bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu
K10D0138_H0140:409b-8: rtsa bdun sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa
K10D0138_H0140:409b-9: 'di dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad
K10D0138_H0140:409b-10: do // ces gsol to // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das /
K10D0138_H0140:409b-11: bdag cag gis kyang dus gsum du gshegs pa thams
K10D0138_H0140:409b-12: cad la mchod pa'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs
K10D0138_H0140:409b-13: 'di rigs pas ston par bkur zhing gus pa chen
K10D0138_H0140:409b-15: snying rjes sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba
K10D0138_H0140:409b-16: nas bla na med pa'i lam gyi bar la dgod
K10D0138_H0140:409b-17: pa'i slad du bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs
K10D0138_H0140:409b-23: dgon pa'i gnas rnams su rgyas par bstan par bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:409b-24: dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas bar bgyi ba'i
K10D0138_H0140:409b-25: slad du sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par
K10D0138_H0140:409b-26: bgyi'o // yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir
K10D0138_H0140:409b-27: gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams
K10D0138_H0140:410a-3: tshangs pa nas lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i bar thams cad dang /
K10D0138_H0140:410a-4: gang dag gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'dus pa /
K10D0138_H0140:410a-5: sems can gzi brjid che ba /
K10D0138_H0140:410a-6: gzi brjid che ba bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug
K10D0138_H0140:410a-7: cu rtsa bzhi de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig
K10D0138_H0140:410a-9: bdag cag gis kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du
K10D0138_H0140:410a-10: gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du 'dus pa chen po'i
K10D0138_H0140:410a-11: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bgyi ba nas
K10D0138_H0140:410a-12: rgyas par rab tu bshad pa'i bar du bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:410a-13: yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:410a-14: sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:410a-16: chos nyan pa'i gang zag rnams kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:410a-18: gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod par 'gyur
K10D0138_H0140:410a-19: ba der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi
K10D0138_H0140:410a-20: bkas bdag cag gis kyang 'thab pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:410a-25: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /
K10D0138_H0140:410a-26: dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /
K10D0138_H0140:410a-35: tsha ba'i dngos po rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:410b-0: chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du @410b nan tan cher bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:410b-1: chos nyan pa'i rgyal po de dag kyang shin tu yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:410b-2: bsam gtan la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:410b-3: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis legs so //
K10D0138_H0140:410b-8: khyed kyis de bzhin du gyis shig /
K10D0138_H0140:410b-11: gnyi ga'i phyir nan tan gyis shig /
K10D0138_H0140:410b-12: de ltar na khyed kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i
K10D0138_H0140:410b-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la mchod pa
K10D0138_H0140:410b-15: 'di ltar khyed kyis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:410b-16: dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'bar bar bya ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:410b-17: dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir brtson na /
K10D0138_H0140:410b-18: khyed ring por mi thogs par myur du bla na
K10D0138_H0140:410b-19: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
K10D0138_H0140:410b-20: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0138_H0140:410b-21: de nas dbus kyi gling bzhi pa 'di na gnas pa'i brgya byin dang /
K10D0138_H0140:410b-24: lha'i dbang po nas lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i bar dang /
K10D0138_H0140:410b-25: gang dag yang sems can gzi brjid che ba /
K10D0138_H0140:410b-26: gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad stan las
K10D0138_H0140:410b-27: langs te thal mo sbyar nas 'dus te 'di skad
K10D0138_H0140:410b-28: ces gsol to // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams
K10D0138_H0140:410b-29: cad kyi bkas bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi tshul
K10D0138_H0140:411a-1: chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs
K10D0138_H0140:411a-2: pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang
K10D0138_H0140:411a-3: rigs pas blang bar bgyi ba nas grong dang /
K10D0138_H0140:411a-9: dgon pa'i gnas rnams su rgyas par bshad par bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:411a-10: dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:411a-12: gang dag yang chos srung bar gnas pa'am /
K10D0138_H0140:411a-14: chos nyan pa'i dge slong dang /
K10D0138_H0140:411a-18: dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams
K10D0138_H0140:411a-19: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas glegs bam
K10D0138_H0140:411a-20: la bris te 'chang ba'i bar du bgyid pa dang
K10D0138_H0140:411a-21: / bsam gtan la brtson pa de dag bdag cag gis bsrung bar bgyi /
K10D0138_H0140:411a-32: yo byad thams cad kyi bar gyis bsti stang du bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:411a-35: ston pa'i drung du bdag cag nyid mnyan pa'i slad du nye bar mchi bar bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:411a-36: bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ston par 'du shes pas gdugs dang /
K10D0138_H0140:411a-38: ba dang gyis bsti stang du bgyi /
K10D0138_H0140:411b-0: bla mar @411b bgyi; ri mor bgyi /
K10D0138_H0140:411b-2: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10D0138_H0140:411b-3: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs
K10D0138_H0140:411b-4: kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad pa'i
K10D0138_H0140:411b-5: tshe chos kyi bcud kyis bdag cag mdangs dang ldan
K10D0138_H0140:411b-11: phyogs dang g-yog tu ldan zhing /
K10D0138_H0140:411b-12: chos dang mthu thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro //
K10D0138_H0140:411b-13: de ltar bdag cag gis yul thams cad du 'thab pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:411b-19: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /
K10D0138_H0140:411b-20: dus ma lags pa'i rlung dang /
K10D0138_H0140:411b-33: mi dge ba'i phyogs bgyid pa'i dngos po rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:411b-42: tsha ba rnams dus gsum du 'byung bar bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:411b-48: dus rnams kyang legs par 'byung bar bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:411b-52: zla ba rnams kyang legs par rgyu bar bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:412a-3: lteng ka'ang shin tu gtams par bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:412a-4: gang du sems can rnams chu'i glang gis gnod par gyur pa'ang bdag cag gis bsal bar bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:412a-8: ljongs de dag tu'ang sems can la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag cag gis 'dab ma dang /
K10D0138_H0140:412a-16: lo tog rnams shin tu snum pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:412a-19: ro che zhing mang bar bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:412a-20: sems can rnams la nor dang /
K10D0138_H0140:412a-24: lhab lhub kyis mi brel bar bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:412a-25: sems can de dag kyang dge ba tshol ba'i sems dang /
K10D0138_H0140:412a-26: sdig pa yongs su spong ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:412a-28: bsod nams 'byung ba tshe ring por bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:412a-34: pho brang 'khor gang dag tu sangs rgyas thams cad
K10D0138_H0140:412a-35: kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos
K10D0138_H0140:412a-37: tha na glegs bam la bris te 'chang ngam /
K10D0138_H0140:412a-40: bsti stang bgyid cing 'chang ba de dag tu rgyal
K10D0138_H0140:412a-41: po rgyal rigs spyin bo nas dbang bskur ba 'byung
K10D0138_H0140:412a-42: ba de dag kyang bdag cag gis bsrung bar bgyi'o
K10D0138_H0140:412b-0: de dag la @412b gnod pa bsal bar bgyi /
K10D0138_H0140:412b-16: ser sna thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:412b-17: yang dag pa'i lta ba'i lam drang po dang /
K10D0138_H0140:412b-22: khrel yod pa la gzud par bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:412b-23: de bzhin du btsun mo dam pa rnams dang /
K10D0138_H0140:412b-34: bu mo rnams kyang bsrung zhing bskyang bar bgyi ba nas ngo tsha shes pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:412b-35: khrel yod pa'i bar la gzud par bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:412b-36: tha na yul de dag tu rkang bzhi pa rnams kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:412b-37: gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad par 'gyur
K10D0138_H0140:412b-38: ba nas glegs bam la bris te bzhag pa'i bar
K10D0138_H0140:412b-39: du bgyid na / sems can de dag la bdag
K10D0138_H0140:412b-40: cag gis de 'dra ba'i nan tan chen po dang
K10D0138_H0140:412b-41: du bgyid na / / rtul ba chen pos yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:412b-42: chos kyi tshul yang dag par bstan pa'i slad du bskal pa mtha' yas par nan tan cher bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:413a-0: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de @413a *//
K10D0138_H0140:413a-1: dag thams cad kyis skyes bu dam pa de dag la legs so //
K10D0138_H0140:413a-6: khyod kyis de bzhin du gyis shig /
K10D0138_H0140:413a-7: khyed kyis chos kyi tshul dang /
K10D0138_H0140:413a-8: dkon mchog gsum mi nub par nan tan byas na /
K10D0138_H0140:413a-9: de ltar khyed kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs
K10D0138_H0140:413a-10: rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la mchod pa byas
K10D0138_H0140:413a-11: par 'gyur ro // 'dus pa chen po rin po che rtog gi gzungs las /
K10D0138_H0140:413a-12: kun tu srung ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o ////
K10D0138_H0140:413a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas brgya byin dang /
K10D0138_H0140:413a-18: lus ngan po rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0138_H0140:413a-20: nga sems can la snying rje'i smon lam gyis nyon
K10D0138_H0140:413a-21: mos pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa chos
K10D0138_H0140:413a-22: kyi mu ge byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir
K10D0138_H0140:413a-23: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
K10D0138_H0140:413a-24: chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
K10D0138_H0140:413a-25: sems can ma rig pa'i mun par zhugs pa /
K10D0138_H0140:413a-26: nyon mongs pa'i chom rkun dang /
K10D0138_H0140:413a-27: g-yon can gyis gtses pa rnams kyi nyon mongs pa
K10D0138_H0140:413a-28: rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ngas bdud kyi
K10D0138_H0140:413a-30: dam pa'i chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni /
K10D0138_H0140:413a-32: sems can tshad med pa dag ni /
K10D0138_H0140:413b-0: sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su thar @413b par byas /
K10D0138_H0140:413b-1: dam pa'i chos kyi char ni /
K10D0138_H0140:413b-6: des gang gi phyir da ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /
K10D0138_H0140:413b-7: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang
K10D0138_H0140:413b-8: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las
K10D0138_H0140:413b-9: 'das pa dpag tu med pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas
K10D0138_H0140:413b-10: kyi zhing gi sa'i bcud dang /
K10D0138_H0140:413b-11: sems can gyi gnas kyi nyes pa rnams rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:413b-12: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:413b-13: mi dge ba'i las thams cad ma lus par zad par bya ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:413b-14: dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs yun ring du gnas par
K10D0138_H0140:413b-15: bya ba nas sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa mtha' dag
K10D0138_H0140:413b-16: yongs su grub par bya ba'i phyir chos mnyam pa
K10D0138_H0140:413b-17: nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying
K10D0138_H0140:413b-18: pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya
K10D0138_H0140:413b-19: dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa
K10D0138_H0140:413b-20: lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis
K10D0138_H0140:413b-21: dang / brlabs kyi / de bzhin du khyed kyis kyang byin gyis rlobs la srungs shig /
K10D0138_H0140:413b-22: gang nga'i dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par
K10D0138_H0140:413b-23: srung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bas bsod nams mngon par
K10D0138_H0140:413b-30: dkon mchog gsum gyi skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:413b-31: dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:413b-32: tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa
K10D0138_H0140:413b-33: bas bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa'i tshogs dang
K10D0138_H0140:414a-0: / @414a *// gang bsam gtan dang po sgom pa nas 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa sgom pa'i bar dang /
K10D0138_H0140:414a-1: gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya
K10D0138_H0140:414a-2: ba nas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon par 'du
K10D0138_H0140:414a-3: bya ba'i bar gyi bsod nams kyi tshogs dang /
K10D0138_H0140:414a-4: gang yang de 'dra ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi
K10D0138_H0140:414a-5: dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba da
K10D0138_H0140:414a-7: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byed par 'gyur ba nas
K10D0138_H0140:414a-8: nga'i dam pa'i chos kyi sgron ma 'di 'bar bar
K10D0138_H0140:414a-9: 'gyur ba'i bar du bsod nams mngon par 'du bya
K10D0138_H0140:414a-10: ba'i tshogs de dag thams cad khyed kyi lag tu
K10D0138_H0140:414a-11: gtad do; ;gang de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud
K10D0138_H0140:414a-12: pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par 'bar bar byed
K10D0138_H0140:414a-13: par brtson pa de dag gis bsod nams kyi tshogs
K10D0138_H0140:414a-14: kyang khyed kyi lag tu gtad do //
K10D0138_H0140:414a-15: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang dag chos kyi rnam
K10D0138_H0140:414a-16: grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas tha na glegs bam la
K10D0138_H0140:414a-17: bris te 'chang ba'i bar du byed pa de dag
K10D0138_H0140:414a-18: kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis las thams cad byang
K10D0138_H0140:414a-20: grong ngam dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar du gang dang
K10D0138_H0140:414a-21: gang na chos smra ba shin tu khrus byas te
K10D0138_H0140:414a-22: gos gsar pa bgos nas me tog bkram pa'i 'khor
K10D0138_H0140:414a-23: gyi khyams su spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa /
K10D0138_H0140:414a-25: ras sna tshogs bting ba'i sengge'i khri la 'dug ste
K10D0138_H0140:414a-26: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lce'i rtse mos 'chad dam
K10D0138_H0140:414b-0: / tha na glegs bam la @414b bris te klog pa der gal te khyod chos nyan pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:414b-2: chos nyan pa rnams yongs su bskyab ba'am /
K10D0138_H0140:414b-5: gnyi ga mi dge ba'i las yongs su zad par bya ba'i phyir der ma dong na /
K10D0138_H0140:414b-6: de'i phyir khyed kyis bslus pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:414b-7: lam bskyed pa la rmongs par bya par 'gyur ro //
K10D0138_H0140:414b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das la mi med kyi bdag po tshangs pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0138_H0140:414b-11: ma mchis pa'i dus na dam pa'i chos kyi tshul
K10D0138_H0140:414b-12: gyi bar du nub par gyur pa na grong ngam
K10D0138_H0140:414b-23: dmangs kyi khyim gang dang gang du dge slong ngam /
K10D0138_H0140:414b-26: dge bsnyen ma chos smra ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:414b-27: gzhan yang dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu
K10D0138_H0140:414b-28: mo shin tu khrus bgyis te yan lag shin tu
K10D0138_H0140:414b-29: byugs nas gos gsar pa 'tshal te me tog bkram
K10D0138_H0140:414b-30: pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs
K10D0138_H0140:414b-31: pa / ras bcos bu dang ras sna tshogs bting ba /
K10D0138_H0140:414b-32: ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis bskor ba'i sengge'i khri
K10D0138_H0140:414b-33: la 'dug ste lce'i rtse mos gzungs kyi phyag rgya
K10D0138_H0140:414b-34: 'di gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab
K10D0138_H0140:414b-35: tu bris te klog pa der chos nyan pa'am /
K10D0138_H0140:415a-2: chos nyin pa de dag dang /
K10D0138_H0140:415a-5: gnyi ga'i nyon mongs pa'i las yongs su sbyang ba'am; dge ba'i chos yongs su smin par bgyi ba'am /
K10D0138_H0140:415a-6: chos kyi tshul chen po yang dag par 'bar bar bgyi ba'am /
K10D0138_H0140:415a-7: ye shes snang ba chen po mchog ge lam la
K10D0138_H0140:415a-8: 'jug pa'i slad du bdag 'khor brgya stong du mas
K10D0138_H0140:415a-9: bskor te / der ma mchis sam /
K10D0138_H0140:415a-10: grong nas dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar de dag yongs su bskyang ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:415a-11: sems can de dag gi nor dang /
K10D0138_H0140:415a-14: bang ba mang por rab tu dgang ba'i slad du der ma mchis na /
K10D0138_H0140:415a-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar
K10D0138_H0140:415a-16: bdag gis sngon ma thos pa'i bro bor pa'i dam
K10D0138_H0140:415a-22: ya mi kha kha kha kha /
K10D0138_H0140:415a-23: kha ba kha ba kha ba /
K10D0138_H0140:415a-26: gal te bdag chos nyan pa'am /
K10D0138_H0140:415a-27: chos smra ba bsrung ba nas nor dang /
K10D0138_H0140:415a-30: bang ba mang po rnams par 'phel bas tshim par
K10D0138_H0140:415a-31: bgyi pa'i bar gyi slad du der ma mchis na
K10D0138_H0140:415a-32: / yi dam las 'gal bar 'gyur ba lags so //
K10D0138_H0140:415a-33: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad dang /
K10D0138_H0140:415b-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @415b chen po thams cad dang /
K10D0138_H0140:415b-3: lha ma yin thams cad kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa de la legs so //
K10D0138_H0140:415b-4: zhes bya ba rab tu byin no //
K10D0138_H0140:415b-5: de nas koo shi kas 'di skad ces [?] gsol to //
K10D0138_H0140:415b-8: ma mchis pa'i dus na grong ngam /
K10D0138_H0140:415b-9: gror khyer gang dang gang du zhes bya ba nas 'di ni /
K10D0138_H0140:415b-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar
K10D0138_H0140:415b-11: bdag gis sngon ma thos pa'i bro bor ba'i dam
K10D0138_H0140:415b-12: bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar
K10D0138_H0140:415b-18: aa mu ba ha aa ka ta ta; aa kha aa sha kha /
K10D0138_H0140:415b-21: bdag gis ngam bcas pa bzhin du ma bgyis na /
K10D0138_H0140:415b-23: bdag gi bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba nas mi dang /
K10D0138_H0140:415b-24: mi ma yin pa dag gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la legs so //
K10D0138_H0140:415b-25: zhes bya ba byin pa'i bar du'o //
K10D0138_H0140:415b-26: de nas 'phags skyes pos kyang gsol pa /
K10D0138_H0140:415b-29: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na grong gi bar du gnang
K10D0138_H0140:415b-30: dang gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di srung bar
K10D0138_H0140:415b-33: bdag gis bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur lags so //
K10D0138_H0140:415b-35: au kha na ba na ba sa ba na /
K10D0138_H0140:415b-36: sa mu dra sad did dzny'a /
K10D0138_H0140:415b-38: wa ru na ba b'a r'a dz'a sv'ah'a /
K10D0138_H0140:415b-40: mi ma yin pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po /
K10D0138_H0140:416a-1: zhes bya ba rab tu byin no //
K10D0138_H0140:416a-2: de nas mig mi bzang gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0138_H0140:416a-5: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na grong gi bar du gang
K10D0138_H0140:416a-6: dang gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di srung bar
K10D0138_H0140:416a-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar bdag
K10D0138_H0140:416a-10: gis bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar
K10D0138_H0140:416a-17: aa ma sa r'a dza na tsarya ya mu dza sv'ah'a /
K10D0138_H0140:416a-19: mi ma yin pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang la legs so //
K10D0138_H0140:416a-20: zhes bya ba rab tu byin no //
K10D0138_H0140:416a-21: de nas yul 'khor srung gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0138_H0140:416a-24: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na grong gi bar du gang
K10D0138_H0140:416a-25: dang gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di srung bar
K10D0138_H0140:416a-28: bdag gis bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba lags so //
K10D0138_H0140:416a-36: mi ma yin pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung la legs so //
K10D0138_H0140:416a-37: zhes bya ba rab tu byin no //
K10D0138_H0140:416a-38: de nas lus ngan pos kyang 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0138_H0140:416a-41: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na grong gi bang du gang
K10D0138_H0140:416b-0: dang @416b gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di srung
K10D0138_H0140:416b-4: bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
K10D0138_H0140:416b-5: bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur
K10D0138_H0140:416b-7: kshu tre kshu kshu kshu tre /
K10D0138_H0140:416b-10: aa na ya na kshu tre /
K10D0138_H0140:416b-12: sa ga ra hri da kshu tre /
K10D0138_H0140:416b-14: dharma ksha ya mu tre sv'ah'a /
K10D0138_H0140:416b-16: mi ma yin pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po lus ngan po la lags so //
K10D0138_H0140:416b-17: zhes bya ba rab tu byin no //
K10D0138_H0140:416b-18: yang de'i tshe gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
K10D0138_H0140:416b-19: 'di na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen
K10D0138_H0140:416b-20: po 'di na yongs su skyong pa stong nyis brgya
K10D0138_H0140:416b-21: dang / gzhan yang gling bzhi pa gzhan na gnas pa bzhi khri dang /
K10D0138_H0140:416b-29: lto 'phye chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba /
K10D0138_H0140:416b-30: rdzu 'phrul che ba de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0138_H0140:416b-33: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dam pa'i chos kyi sgron
K10D0138_H0140:416b-34: ma'i bar du nub par 'gyur ba'i tshe grong ngam
K10D0138_H0140:416b-41: rgyal po'i pho brang ngam; bram ze'i khyim mam /
K10D0138_H0140:416b-43: bdag nyid chen po'i khyim mam /
K10D0138_H0140:416b-44: dmangs kyi khyim gang dang gang du dge slong ngam /
K10D0138_H0140:417a-2: gzhan yang dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu
K10D0138_H0140:417a-3: mo shin tu khrus bgyis te yan lag shin tu
K10D0138_H0140:417a-4: byugs nas gos gsar pa bgos te me tog bkram
K10D0138_H0140:417a-5: pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su ras bcos bu sna tshogs
K10D0138_H0140:417a-6: bting ba / spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa /
K10D0138_H0140:417a-7: ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis gtams pas brgyan pa'i
K10D0138_H0140:417a-8: sengge'i khri la mchis te gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos
K10D0138_H0140:417a-9: kyi rnam grangs 'di lce'i rtse mos gzhan la rgya
K10D0138_H0140:417a-10: cher yang dag par bshad dam /
K10D0138_H0140:417a-11: glegs bam la bris te klog par gal te bdag
K10D0138_H0140:417a-12: cag re re zhing yang 'khor brgya stong du mas
K10D0138_H0140:417a-15: chos smra ba bsrung ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:417a-17: sems can gzhan yang bsrung ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:417a-18: sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du grong ngam /
K10D0138_H0140:417a-19: grong rdal nas dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar de dag tu ma mchis sam /
K10D0138_H0140:417a-20: 'khor dang bcas pas bka' ma mnos sam /
K10D0138_H0140:417a-22: der sems can rnams kyi nor dang /
K10D0138_H0140:417a-25: bang ba mang po rab tu ma gtams sam /
K10D0138_H0140:417a-27: der sems can rnams kyi 'thab pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:417a-31: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /
K10D0138_H0140:417a-32: dus ma lags pa'i char pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:417a-35: tsha ba rnams ma bzlog na /
K10D0138_H0140:417b-1: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la bslus pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:417b-3: mnyes par ma bgyis par 'gyur te /
K10D0138_H0140:417b-4: lus la sha bkras btab pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:417b-5: lta ba yongs su nyams pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:417b-7: bdag cag g-yog dang bcas pas da ltar dang /
K10D0138_H0140:417b-8: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten
K10D0138_H0140:417b-9: gyi khams 'dir bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
K10D0138_H0140:417b-10: sh'akya thub pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di 'bar bar bgyi'o
K10D0138_H0140:417b-11: // chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad pa'i gang zag rnams bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:417b-14: ngan par bgyis pa'i las yongs su sbyang ba'i slad
K10D0138_H0140:417b-15: du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i chos smra
K10D0138_H0140:417b-16: ba'i gang zag de la bskul bar bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:417b-18: chos nyan pa de dag gi nor dang /
K10D0138_H0140:417b-21: kun spyod pa rnam par 'phel ba bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:417b-22: rgyal ba'i bstan pa mi 'jig pa'i chos su gzung bar bgyi'o //
K10D0138_H0140:417b-23: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis mi dang /
K10D0138_H0140:417b-24: mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad la legs so //
K10D0138_H0140:417b-26: khyod de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de la
K10D0138_H0140:417b-27: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ltad mo
K10D0138_H0140:417b-31: gang bdud bye ba phrag brgya po 'dir 'dus pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa lags sam /
K10D0138_H0140:418a-3: byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can gyis gsol pa /
K10D0138_H0140:418a-4: ci 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyis dkon mchog gsum la dad pa thob pa lags sam /
K10D0138_H0140:418a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0138_H0140:418a-9: bdud sdig can g-yog stong yod pa 'di dad pa ma thob ste /
K10D0138_H0140:418a-10: 'khrugs shing yid mi dga' nas da ltar dang /
K10D0138_H0140:418a-11: ma 'ongs dus na'ang dam pa'i chos kyi tshul ji
K10D0138_H0140:418a-12: srid 'bar ba de srid du 'di glags lta zhing
K10D0138_H0140:418a-13: skabs tshol te / dam pa'i chos kyi tshul gzhig pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:418a-14: nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed do //
K10D0138_H0140:418a-15: de bzhin du g-yog khri sum stong yod pa'i bdud bco brgyad dang /
K10D0138_H0140:418a-16: g-yog nyi shu rtsa gcig yod pa nyis brgya po
K10D0138_H0140:418a-17: 'di dag kyang g-yog dang bcas pa dkon mchog gsum
K10D0138_H0140:418a-18: la dad pa ma thob ste /
K10D0138_H0140:418a-19: 'khrugs shing yid mi dga' bas 'di dag da ltar dang /
K10D0138_H0140:418a-20: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang ji srid du dam pa'i
K10D0138_H0140:418a-21: chos kyi tshul rab tu rgyas pa de srid du
K10D0138_H0140:418a-22: 'di dag nga'i bstan pa la glags lta zhing skabs
K10D0138_H0140:418a-23: tshol te / dam pa'i chos kyi tshul gzhig pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:418a-24: nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed do //
K10D0138_H0140:418a-26: sngon chang 'khon du bzung ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:418a-27: dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyed pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:418a-28: mi dge ba'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:418a-29: dge bas skyo zhing mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba mi 'dod pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:418a-30: smon lam ma btab pa'i phyir sems dang /
K10D0138_H0140:418b-3: rab tu gtong bar mi byed do //
K10D0138_H0140:418b-4: sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po 'di lta bu mthong ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:418b-5: gzungs zab mo 'di lta bu thos pas rgyu de
K10D0138_H0140:418b-6: nyid kyis phyin chad bla na med pa yang dag
K10D0138_H0140:418b-7: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dad pa rab tu
K10D0138_H0140:418b-9: byang chub sems dpa' ltar mo can gyis gsol pa /
K10D0138_H0140:418b-11: 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gal te sems
K10D0138_H0140:418b-12: can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa rnams kyi
K10D0138_H0140:418b-13: rna lam du grag par gyur pa na'ang de nyid
K10D0138_H0140:418b-14: de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par
K10D0138_H0140:418b-15: rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba ni /
K10D0138_H0140:418b-20: yang de'i tshe bdud ri byi zhes bya ba sngon
K10D0138_H0140:418b-21: gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa
K10D0138_H0140:418b-22: / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa /
K10D0138_H0140:418b-23: dkon mchog gsum la dad pa mi nyams pa rnyed par gyur pa /
K10D0138_H0140:418b-24: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob pa de /
K10D0138_H0140:418b-25: drang srong chen po'i cha byad du de bzhin gshegs
K10D0138_H0140:418b-26: pa sh'akya thub pa'i spyan sngar 'dug par gyur nas
K10D0138_H0140:418b-27: de stan las langs te kun tu bltas nas thal
K10D0138_H0140:418b-28: mo sbyar te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
K10D0138_H0140:418b-29: stobs bskyed pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa
K10D0138_H0140:418b-30: 'di dbyangs kyis gang bar byas te 'di skad ces
K10D0138_H0140:418b-31: smras so // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /
K10D0138_H0140:419a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @419a *//
K10D0138_H0140:419a-1: thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol /
K10D0138_H0140:419a-12: bdud g-yog dang bcas pa rnams kyang bdag gi tshig 'di la gson cig /
K10D0138_H0140:419a-13: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa thugs rje chen po mnga' ba /
K10D0138_H0140:419a-14: sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga can thams cad rnam par gcod pa /
K10D0138_H0140:419a-15: yon tan bkod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par
K10D0138_H0140:419a-16: mdzad pa'i ston pa 'di sngon gyi smon lam gyis
K10D0138_H0140:419a-17: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu nyon mongs pa can
K10D0138_H0140:419a-18: / snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'di lta bur
K10D0138_H0140:419a-19: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
K10D0138_H0140:419a-20: chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can
K10D0138_H0140:419a-21: mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa /
K10D0138_H0140:419a-24: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa /
K10D0138_H0140:419a-25: ngan par spyod pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams
K10D0138_H0140:419a-26: kyi sems kyi rgyud yongs su smin par mdzad pa
K10D0138_H0140:419a-27: dang / ngan song gsum las shin tu bzla ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:419a-28: theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:419a-31: bzod pa la dgod pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:419a-32: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par byed pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:419a-33: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par mdzad pa'i slad du zhugs kyi /
K10D0138_H0140:419b-0: de la khyed kyis kyang @419b ci nas ston pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:419b-1: sangs rgyas kyi tshul 'di'ang rnam par mi 'jig pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:419b-2: sgrub pa dang mi ldan pa ma gtogs par da ltar dang /
K10D0138_H0140:419b-3: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang bdud dam /
K10D0138_H0140:419b-4: bdud kyi 'khor sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab
K10D0138_H0140:419b-5: tu gsungs pa rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'di la sems
K10D0138_H0140:419b-8: nub par bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:419b-9: gang dag yang dam pa'i chos 'di 'dzin pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:419b-10: chos la nan tan bgyid pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:419b-12: chos nyan pa'i dge slong ngam /
K10D0138_H0140:419b-16: gzhan yang dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo las gsum la mngon par brtson pa /
K10D0138_H0140:419b-17: bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po la dga' ba /
K10D0138_H0140:419b-18: dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i las la mngon par brtson pa /
K10D0138_H0140:419b-19: khams gsum na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa spong ba la mngon par brtson pa /
K10D0138_H0140:419b-20: sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par bgyid par gyur pa /
K10D0138_H0140:419b-25: bdud kyi pho nyas gtse ba'i bsam pas glags lta ba'am /
K10D0138_H0140:419b-26: skabs tshol du mchi zhing g-yeng ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:419b-27: dge ba'i bar chad kyi las bgyid par mi 'gyur ba de ltar mdzod cig /
K10D0138_H0140:420a-0: da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das @420a *//
K10D0138_H0140:420a-2: bdag la las kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol /
K10D0138_H0140:420a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /
K10D0138_H0140:420a-14: mi ma yin pa thams cad kyang bdag la thugs brtse bar mdzod cig /
K10D0138_H0140:420a-15: gang su dag da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir
K10D0138_H0140:420a-16: gtogs pa'i sa la gnas pa de dag kyang sems
K10D0138_H0140:420a-17: can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:420a-18: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dam pa'i chos yun ring
K10D0138_H0140:420a-19: du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag la thugs
K10D0138_H0140:420a-21: bdag la gsang sngags kyi dngos grub stsol cig /
K10D0138_H0140:420a-23: bdud kyi 'khor de nan tur gyis tshar gcad pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:420a-27: rdzu 'phrul nyams par bgyi ba'i sngags bshad par bgyi ste /
K10D0138_H0140:420a-33: bdud kyi pho nya gang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan
K10D0138_H0140:420a-34: pa la sems ma dad pa gcig tsam bskyed dam
K10D0138_H0140:420a-36: tha na skad cig gcig tsam yang sems 'khrug par
K10D0138_H0140:420a-37: bgyid pa nas dge ba'i phyogs yongs su 'dri bar
K10D0138_H0140:420b-0: bgyid pa'i bar du @420b nan tan bgyid pa dang
K10D0138_H0140:420b-6: ri brag de rnams ma rungs par bgyid par sems bskyed pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:420b-7: gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad par 'gyur
K10D0138_H0140:420b-8: pa de dag tu than skad cig gcig tsam 'thab
K10D0138_H0140:420b-12: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /
K10D0138_H0140:420b-13: dus ma lags pa'i rlung dang /
K10D0138_H0140:420b-20: skar mda' ltung bar bgyid pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:420b-26: ro skye bar mi bgyid dam /
K10D0138_H0140:420b-27: ma rungs par bgyid par 'tshal na /
K10D0138_H0140:420b-28: bdud des de ltar sems bskyed ma thag tu bdud
K10D0138_H0140:420b-29: nas bdud kyi pho nya'i bar de dag rims nad
K10D0138_H0140:420b-35: las su mi rung ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:420b-37: bcing ba lngas bcings par mthong ba nas de'i yan lag thams cad 'khums pa'i bar du 'gyur zhing /
K10D0138_H0140:420b-38: slar brkyang mi nus pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:420b-39: de'i phyogs thams cad mun par gyur nas nyi ma snang ba'i gzugs kyang mi mthong ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:420b-40: de'i rdzu 'phrul bri nas sems 'khrug par 'gyur /
K10D0138_H0140:420b-41: de'i dbang po drug kyang spyod yul la 'jug mi nus par 'gyur ro //
K10D0138_H0140:421a-8: bi da dznye ba sa kha ga /
K10D0138_H0140:421a-12: m'u la ba nya kha ga spa /
K10D0138_H0140:421a-13: khad nya spa; ba ri barta m'u ra /
K10D0138_H0140:421a-17: na ba h'a dzny'a da dzny'a /
K10D0138_H0140:421a-21: ta th'a t'a dzny'a da dzny'a /
K10D0138_H0140:421a-22: sarba de dznye gi aa dhishthi ta dzny'a da dzny'a /
K10D0138_H0140:421a-23: ba kra ma; tri ga na t'a ksha pa ksha
K10D0138_H0140:421a-24: ma ma ksha ma dzny'a ksha bi ta ma ra
K10D0138_H0140:421a-26: thams cad mkhyen pa rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis
K10D0138_H0140:421a-27: skad cig tu bdud kyi yul thams cad med par
K10D0138_H0140:421a-28: byas te 'bras bu med par gyur to //
K10D0138_H0140:421a-29: gang su'ang rung gnod par 'dod pa dag kyang de bzhin no //
K10D0138_H0140:421a-30: de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis legs so //
K10D0138_H0140:421a-32: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /
K10D0138_H0140:421a-35: lha thams cad kyis kyang legs so //
K10D0138_H0140:421a-36: zhes bya ba rab tu byin no //
K10D0138_H0140:421a-37: de nas de'i tshe sa ni /
K10D0138_H0140:421a-41: rab tu g-yos te gang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:421a-42: byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa thob pa rnams ma gtogs par bdud 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:421a-43: de bzhin du 'byung po ma rungs pa rnams kyang 'khrugs so //
K10D0138_H0140:421a-44: de nas bdud sdig can gyis byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0138_H0140:421b-0: sra ba'i blo gros la smras @421b pa; rigs kyi
K10D0138_H0140:421b-1: bu / bdud ri byi 'di'i stobs ga las 'ongs /
K10D0138_H0140:421b-3: gang snying rje med pa 'dis rang gi phyogs thams cad dang /
K10D0138_H0140:421b-5: pha rol gnon pa thams cad ma lus par bcom ste nag po'i rtsa lag ni /
K10D0138_H0140:421b-7: mi mthun pa chad par smra ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:421b-8: dge sbyong goo ta ma'i phyogs ni /
K10D0138_H0140:421b-9: mtho bar byas pa bdag kyang gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu lus dri mi zhim pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:421b-11: las su mi rung bar gyur /
K10D0138_H0140:421b-12: bdag gi phyogs thams cad kyang mun par gyur te
K10D0138_H0140:421b-13: snang zhing mtho bar med par byas nas yongs su
K10D0138_H0140:421b-14: gdung ba chen pos kyang bdag gdungs so //
K10D0138_H0140:421b-15: byang chub sems dpa' sra ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa /
K10D0138_H0140:421b-17: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /
K10D0138_H0140:421b-19: mi ma yin pa thams cad kyi stobs bskyed pas bdud ri byis bdud kyi stobs kyi yul dang /
K10D0138_H0140:421b-20: pha rol gnod pa 'dir thams cad rnam par 'joms shing /
K10D0138_H0140:421b-21: des gzhan gyis mi tshugs pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang bshad kyi /
K10D0138_H0140:421b-23: khyod de bzhin gshegs pa rnams par dad par gyis shig /
K10D0138_H0140:421b-26: yid kyi sdug bsngal 'di dag las yongs su grol
K10D0138_H0140:421b-27: bar 'gyur bar bla na med pa yang dag par
K10D0138_H0140:421b-28: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rang sems bskyed cig /
K10D0138_H0140:422a-3: phyi ma'i mtha'i mu grangs med par 'di bas kyang ches sdig pa'i lus dang /
K10D0138_H0140:422a-5: yid kyi sdug bsngal rnams la spro'i /
K10D0138_H0140:422a-6: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ni /
K10D0138_H0140:422a-8: 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las /
K10D0138_H0140:422a-9: dam pa'i chos kyi tshul srung ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o ////

K10D0138_H0140:428a-4: bdug pa thams cad kyang shin tu byung /
K10D0138_H0140:428a-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyang snang bas khyab
K10D0138_H0140:428a-6: par byas nas 'khor thams cad thal mo sbyar te
K10D0138_H0140:428a-7: 'khod do // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tsandan
K10D0138_H0140:428a-8: gyi dri chen po la mi mjed kyi bdag po
K10D0138_H0140:428a-11: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:428a-14: kun chub par byed pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:428a-15: gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:428a-17: bris nas 'chad par bgyid pa'i sems can de dag
K10D0138_H0140:428a-18: dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam dang ldan par 'gyur;
K10D0138_H0140:428a-19: sems can de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
K10D0138_H0140:428a-20: kyis chos du zhig gis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur
K10D0138_H0140:428a-21: / de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:428a-22: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tsandan gyi dri
K10D0138_H0140:428a-23: chen pos mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la
K10D0138_H0140:428a-26: ci nas bdud kyi phyogs tshar gcad pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:428a-27: 'thab pa'i rnyog pa thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:428a-28: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:428a-29: dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:428b-0: lam rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir sangs @428b
K10D0138_H0140:428b-1: rgyas thams cad kyi khams drug byin gyis brlabs so
K10D0138_H0140:428b-2: // de bzhin du gang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na
K10D0138_H0140:428b-3: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas bris te
K10D0138_H0140:428b-4: 'chang ba'i bar gyi sems can de dag sangs rgyas
K10D0138_H0140:428b-5: dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis chos bcus
K10D0138_H0140:428b-11: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis lha dang /
K10D0138_H0140:428b-20: grul bum de dag la khyod kyis sems can de dag rtag tu srungs shig /
K10D0138_H0140:428b-24: yid kyi las dge ba la tshud cig /
K10D0138_H0140:428b-28: kun spyod pa mang po dang /
K10D0138_H0140:428b-29: nad med pa la mkhas pas bdag gi srog dang yang bsngos la /
K10D0138_H0140:428b-30: sems can de dag bzung bar gyis shig /
K10D0138_H0140:428b-31: ces rig pas gtad nas de dag gi dran pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:428b-32: blo gros dang; rtogs pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:428b-33: spobs pa la mkhas pas skyon med par 'gyur ro //
K10D0138_H0140:428b-34: de dag gi yid kyi brnag pa 'dod pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas gnas par mi 'gyur te /
K10D0138_H0140:428b-35: de dag stong pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro //
K10D0138_H0140:428b-36: de dag sems dang mtshungs shing zab mo bzod pa
K10D0138_H0140:428b-37: dang ldan pa la bsdu ba'i dngos po la'ang brtson
K10D0138_H0140:429a-0: par 'gyur ro // dge ba'i chos la gnas nas sems @429a *//
K10D0138_H0140:429a-1: can gyi 'khor gyi lus la snying po blangs te
K10D0138_H0140:429a-2: dngos po gsum yongs su dag pa'i byang chub kyi
K10D0138_H0140:429a-3: spyod pa nyams 'og tu chud par 'gyur ro //
K10D0138_H0140:429a-4: ting nge 'dzin rin po che'i rgyal mtshan yang thob par 'gyur te /
K10D0138_H0140:429a-5: ting nge 'dzin des ting nge 'dzin thams cad la
K10D0138_H0140:429a-6: rnam par spyod pa'i shes pa la'ang mkhas par 'gyur
K10D0138_H0140:429a-7: ro // 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe'ang sems can de
K10D0138_H0140:429a-8: dag gi mdun du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dge
K10D0138_H0140:429a-9: slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor zhing /
K10D0138_H0140:429a-10: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du bdar ba
K10D0138_H0140:429a-11: 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston cing bzhugs pa
K10D0138_H0140:429a-12: grangs med dpag tu med pa dag kyang mthong bar
K10D0138_H0140:429a-13: 'gyur ro // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las don dang /
K10D0138_H0140:429a-15: yi ger ldan pa'i chos bshad pa de lta bu'ang thos par 'gyur ro //
K10D0138_H0140:429a-16: thams cad las khyad par 'phags pa zang zing med pa'i dga' ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:429a-17: mchog tu dga' ba'i bar du thob nas las kyi
K10D0138_H0140:429a-18: sgrib pa mi dge ba de dag thams cad rnam
K10D0138_H0140:429a-19: par shes pa tha ma la chos dang ldan pas
K10D0138_H0140:429a-21: ji ltar bsam pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing
K10D0138_H0140:429a-22: yongs su dag par brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing
K10D0138_H0140:429a-23: / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na sangs rgyas bcom
K10D0138_H0140:429a-24: ldan 'das dag 'tsho zhing gzhes la bzhugs te theg
K10D0138_H0140:429a-25: pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig 'chad pa'i sangs rgyas
K10D0138_H0140:429b-0: kyi zhing der @429b sems can de dag theg pa
K10D0138_H0140:429b-1: chen po la gnas shing sgrib pa med pa'i ye
K10D0138_H0140:429b-2: shes dang ldan pa'i sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i
K10D0138_H0140:429b-3: sems can de dag dang 'grogs par 'gyur te /
K10D0138_H0140:429b-4: ring po mi thogs par yon tan de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10D0138_H0140:429b-5: sems can de dag rang gi smon lam ma gtogs
K10D0138_H0140:429b-6: par phyin chad nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga
K10D0138_H0140:429b-7: dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye
K10D0138_H0140:429b-9: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
K10D0138_H0140:429b-10: pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
K10D0138_H0140:429b-13: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di 'bar bar byed cing /
K10D0138_H0140:429b-14: gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin
K10D0138_H0140:429b-15: pa nas glegs bam la bris te 'chang ba'i bar
K10D0138_H0140:429b-16: gyi sems can de dag thams cad sangs rgyas bcom
K10D0138_H0140:429b-17: ldan 'das rnams kyis chos bcu po de dag gis
K10D0138_H0140:429b-21: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
K10D0138_H0140:429b-22: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par
K10D0138_H0140:429b-23: grol ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por
K10D0138_H0140:429b-24: 'gyur ro // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas brgya byin dang /
K10D0138_H0140:429b-26: 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0138_H0140:430a-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang su dag phyogs bcu nas 'dir @430a *//
K10D0138_H0140:430a-1: byon pa de dag thams cad kyis khyed la thugs brtse ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:430a-2: 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyi rol gyi dngos po rnam par sbyang pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:430a-3: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:430a-4: byang chub kyi spyod pa rab tu bstan pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:430a-5: bdud kyi phyogs pham par bya ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:430a-6: chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:430a-7: sangs rgyas kyi bya ba ma lus par bstan pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:430a-8: dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:430a-9: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:430a-10: nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:430a-11: ma rungs pa thams cad bzlog pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:430a-12: 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:430a-13: lta ba ngan pa thams cad spang ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:430a-14: byang chub kyi lam la gzung ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:430a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:430a-16: las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par bya
K10D0138_H0140:430a-17: ba'i phyir ngo mtshar zhing rmad du byung ba sngon
K10D0138_H0140:430a-18: ma thos pa gzungs kyi tshig zab mo rab tu
K10D0138_H0140:430a-19: dbye ba la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
K10D0138_H0140:430a-21: de ma chags pa med pa'i gzungs la spobs pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:430a-22: ye shes nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa la gzud pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:430a-23: tshul gcig pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir khyim dang /
K10D0138_H0140:430a-26: yul srung ba nas gling bzhi srung ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:430b-0: mi dang @430b mi ma yin pa srung ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:430b-6: lo tog rnams srung ba dang /
K10D0138_H0140:430b-8: chos nyan pa'i bar dag srung bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0138_H0140:430b-10: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
K10D0138_H0140:430b-11: rnams kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las dngos po
K10D0138_H0140:430b-12: re re'ang snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i ye
K10D0138_H0140:430b-13: shes kyi rgyu mthun pa rnam pa bcus byin gyis
K10D0138_H0140:430b-15: dge ba'i chos thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir sangs rgyas dang /
K10D0138_H0140:430b-16: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa yongs su spyod do //
K10D0138_H0140:430b-18: sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes pa thams cad kyi mchod rten du gyur pa /
K10D0138_H0140:430b-19: bla ma'i gnas ston par kun gyis bkur ba /
K10D0138_H0140:430b-20: phyag bya ba'i gnas su gyur pa ste /
K10D0138_H0140:430b-21: 'di ltar mtshams med pa lnga byed pa /
K10D0138_H0140:430b-22: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa dag kyang
K10D0138_H0140:430b-23: las kyi sgrib pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
K10D0138_H0140:430b-24: bu de dag ma lus par yongs su byang bar
K10D0138_H0140:430b-25: 'gyur ro // de dag thams cad las kyi sgrib
K10D0138_H0140:430b-26: pa spangs nas dge ba'i chos rnams la gnas par
K10D0138_H0140:430b-29: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi skyes bu'i mthu chen po'o //
K10D0138_H0140:430b-31: khyed kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir bsti stang du byas te dam pa'i chos 'di gzung bar bya /
K10D0138_H0140:431a-1: zag khyim na gnas pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:431a-3: chos la nan tan byed pa rnams kyang bsrung bar bya'o //
K10D0138_H0140:431a-4: de ltar na khyed la phan pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:431a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me
K10D0138_H0140:431a-7: tog gi rgyal mtshan gyis de'i tshe chos kyi rnam
K10D0138_H0140:431a-9: phan yon rab tu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0138_H0140:431a-10: gang gis zhing kun gser gyis rab tu bkang nas ni //
K10D0138_H0140:431a-11: skyob pa mgon po dag la mchod pa phul ba bas //
K10D0138_H0140:431a-12: gang zhig dam pa mchog gi mdo 'di 'dzin byed na //
K10D0138_H0140:431a-13: 'jigs med des ni bsod nams dpag tu med pa thob //
K10D0138_H0140:431a-14: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gdugs kyi dpal gyis kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0138_H0140:431a-15: brgya tshang pa yi gser rnams las; ;gangg'a'i rlung gi bye ma snyed //
K10D0138_H0140:431a-16: khyu mchog thub la phul bas ni //
K10D0138_H0140:431a-17: mdo 'di'i bsod nams mtshungs mi thob //
K10D0138_H0140:431a-18: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ri bo brtsegs kyis kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0138_H0140:431a-19: me tog tshogs kyi gdugs mchog sprin rnams kyis ni nam mkha' khebs byas te //
K10D0138_H0140:431a-20: gang gis mchod phyir dga' mgu'i yid kyis sangs rgyas rnams la phul ba bas //
K10D0138_H0140:431a-21: gang zhig phyin chad zad 'gyur 'jigs ldan dus na mdo 'di 'dzin byed na //
K10D0138_H0140:431a-22: de yi bsod nams tshad dag sems can kun gyis brjod par mi nus so //
K10D0138_H0140:431b-0: de nas bcom @431b ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
K10D0138_H0140:431b-1: sh'akya thub pas kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to
K10D0138_H0140:431b-2: // thub pa'i spyan sngar mar me'i snying po dri zhim til gyis byugs pa ri rab tsam //
K10D0138_H0140:431b-3: mar me bus pa 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis gus par bskal pa bye bar bzung ba bas //
K10D0138_H0140:431b-4: gang gzhan la las bsod nams 'dod pa bsgribs pa srab par smon pa de dag gis //
K10D0138_H0140:431b-5: zad pa'i dus tshe 'khor du mdo sde'i gtam byas pa ni bsod nams khyad par 'phags //
K10D0138_H0140:431b-6: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0138_H0140:431b-7: blo gros 'chang ba gang gis bzod pa sgom zhing rtag tu brtson 'grus rtsom //
K10D0138_H0140:431b-8: rtag tu bsam gtan gzhol zhing mnyam bzhag lus kyis shes rab spel ba bas //
K10D0138_H0140:431b-9: zad pa'i dus ngan tshen gang zhig dam chos phyag rgya 'di 'dzin pa //
K10D0138_H0140:431b-10: de yi bzod dang brtson 'grus 'di ni mtshungs med shes rab gzhal du med //
K10D0138_H0140:431b-11: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin rdul
K10D0138_H0140:431b-12: dang bral ba'i stobs kyis rnam par gnon pas kyang
K10D0138_H0140:431b-14: gang gis mdo 'di bshad nas bzung dang mngon par bris pa dang //
K10D0138_H0140:431b-15: gzhan dag 'dzin bcug gus par rtag tu klog pa dang //
K10D0138_H0140:431b-16: bdug pa me tog phreng ba gos mchog rnams kyis mchod //
K10D0138_H0140:431b-17: bsod nams gang thob de ni brjod par mi nus so //
K10D0138_H0140:432a-0: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa de dag gis mdo sde @432a *//
K10D0138_H0140:432a-3: phan yon dpag tu med par brjod nas brgya byin dang /
K10D0138_H0140:432a-5: 'jig rten skyong ba de dag la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0138_H0140:432a-8: nyon mongs pa thams cad byang bar byed pa /
K10D0138_H0140:432a-9: phyi ma'i dus na gang thos pa tsam gyis kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi sgrib pa dang /
K10D0138_H0140:432a-10: nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zungs shig /
K10D0138_H0140:432a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang /
K10D0138_H0140:432a-15: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom
K10D0138_H0140:432a-16: ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do
K10D0138_H0140:432a-17: // 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las /
K10D0138_H0140:432a-18: mthar phyin pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o ////
K10D0138_H0140:432a-19: 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog
K10D0138_H0140:432a-20: gi gzungs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
K10D0138_H0140:432a-21: rdzogs so //// rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh'i lendra bo dhi dang /
K10D0138_H0140:432a-22: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bandhe ye shes sdes
